story:
Help me raise 5K in the next 7 hours for our National Fallen Firefighters Foundation and I will video myself in a "tiny hooters" outfit doing the "cold water challenge" and post it to Youtube, Facebook etc for the world to see.  A little embarrassment for me can help a family of one of our fallen firefighters, one of our American Heroes.  

Why 7 hours...because I just thought of the idea to use the "cold water challenge" and raising additional money for the fallen firefighters foundation 17 hours into my 24 hour "cold water challenge" that I was called out on.  So I am going to answer the challenge with a video to prove it or give the foundation $100.  

I would rather help the foundation raise $5,000 plus and get a little grief from my firefighter/military buddies...bring it on!


Brandon Bunch                                                                                                                                      Firefighter, Austin Fire Department                                                                                       Marine Corps Veteran, Kilo 3/5 01-04

story:
We're a small startup out of Portland, Oregon -- And we want to bring task and project management up to pace with 2013.

Upjuggle is an iOS application already available on iTunes, but we want to begin buildling out an enterprise package for business users offering the following:

  • Sync with popular business applications like Outlook, Basecamp, SalesForce, and more
  • Task collaboration -- sharing tasks, deligating tasks, etc.
  • Increased visibility to task progress
  • Offline task syncing
  • A cool basketball game for "shooting" your tasks to complete them (yes, it's part of the enterprise package)

 

So why is it different from the tons of productivity apps already on the marketplace?

The goal behind upjuggle is to ditch the task list...which is the corner stone of pretty much every task app on the marketplace right now. The concept of visualizing task health overall is new. We are taking common inputs such as start date, end date, and % complete and turning into a position on your screen. The higher up the task the better. That way, when you look at your tasks, you know the status immediately at a glance. 

 

Okay so wait...how do you take a bunch of dates and turn it into a location on the screen?

That's our secret sauce. We've come up with a highly sophisticated mathematical equation that takes all these variables into account, and that's what makes upjuggle unique.

 

Can I have a copy of the equation?

No, you can't.

 

How do I know its a viable equation then?

Because it's awesome. But most importantly, we've tested the equation over literally millions of real tasks to get us from the test version (which was really bad) to our production product (which is totally amazing). Plus, we're constantly tweaking and adjusting it based off real user tasks and feedback.

 

Okay I'm sold. I'm going to give you all my money.

That's terrific, we'll love you forever!

 

What happens if upjuggle doesn't get the full funding?

That's okay, we'll still love you forever. As far as upjuggle, the show will go on...just at a slightly slower pace. The full amount would allow us to bring this feature set to the market very quickly.

story:
What is? K-TRAC

We thought long and hard about a person’s personal security, our own security…….what would make us secure……where would we put it, how would we carry it and safely conceal it.

Next we thought who are the most vulnerable……Children, Elderly people (our parents or grandparents) A Significant Other, our Pets.

We are the creators of a GPS (tracking device the size of a Nickel .05 US coin), integrated locator using mobile tower trangulation connected to a mobile app called K-TRAC for Apple and Android. 

K-TRAC is compatible with iPhone, iPad, and Android Devices.

There are over 800,000 children that go missing every year.  

K-TRAC is not only for Children…but Adults can be protected by the same device (depending on individual States and Privacy laws). Do you know how many adults go missing annually? Adults account for an additional 40,000 missing.

Developing K-TRAC is a passion for us. Download the K-TRAC App to your, iPhone, iPad, or Android. The K-TRAC device will come with the instructions and provide a redeem code for you to activate K-TRAC.

How does K-TRAC work:

Once you have activated K-TRAC you can decide where is the best place for you to conceal it.  

How K-TRAC works:

The K-TRAC device integrated locator connects to mobile tower triangulation controlled by the K-TRAC mobile app. The functions include Range Alert, Street view, Satellite View.

The K-TRAC device is powered by a CR1220 Lithium Coin Battery 3.0 Volt.

Performs in extreme temperatures from -22ºF ~ 140ºF
Holds power for 8 years when not in use
Cell size: 1220, IEC: CR1220, Volt: 3

How can you be sure the K-TRAC technology will work?

K-TRAC has already completed beta testing and passed without any issues. We have invested heavily in developing the design, technology and sample production. The majority of this has been devoted to logic board development, battery technology and locator functionality.

What are the risks?

We do not see any risks at all as we have a proven design and working product already completed. We have also applied for patents for our design both domestic and international.

What’s next for K-TRAC?

We have a production-ready prototype in hand with component list, schematics, and assembly protocols.

K-TRAC is ready for production.

Why do we need your help?

We are working with qualified Engineering Companies and we have come this far only on sweat, determination, and private funds who see value in the goals of K-TRAC. All costs so far have come from our own pockets and now we are finally at the point where it takes “real” money to make this happen.

This is why we’ve come to Indiegogo, to help us move forward with K-TRAC. We believe lost Children and Adults need to become a thing of the past. K-TRAC is simply the best way to find your lost child, parent and significant other.  Even the family pet.

Where will your funding go?

We have already invested heavily in the development of the prototype. Your funding is the critical link to the completion of our production phase 1 of the world’s smallest K-TRAC tracking device.

Use of Funds

We have working prototypes and a supply chain that's ready to go. We need your help to take the next step.

We will use the $500,000 raised through this campaign to buy the additional tooling and make the moulds we require for the casings, internal sections, components, connectors and logic boards and all of these parts add up very quickly.  In addition, the cost of bringing our new product K-TRAC to market.

Our manufacturing facility in Shanghai, China will be enhanced to incorporate the full production of K-TRAC.

We now need your help with the costs associated with moving forward into the full production.

If you are unable to donate, please assist us in promoting this fundraiser by sharing with your friends, family and business associates. Thank you.

Twitter: @ktracdevice https://twitter.com/ktracdevice

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/K-Trac/458844007538959?fref=ts

Email Link: http://igg.me/at/k-trac/x/3605550

story:
A Word from Megan's Father: 

Hello everyone, my name is Stu Leavitt, and my wife and I have five terrific children.  Our middle child, Megan, has suffered through an illness for the past 5 years.  The disease is called Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy (RSD) and is also known by Chronic Regional Pain Syndrome (CRPS).  We raised Megan to love God and to love others and she has grown to live out these values in her daily life.  She prays for everyone she knows, has worked with non-profits to help people in need, and even sponsors two children through World Vision.  She genuinely loves to do right and has made me marvel that she keeps up her attitude in spite of her symptoms.  To see her in this pain is heartbreaking and we have tried over the years to get the best treatment for her and finally we could be reaching a turning point with upcoming therapy which is detailed below.  We do not have the money for this so I am appealing to you to help fund the cost of Megan’s infusion therapy which can begin this September.  Your contributions will help relieve some or most of her pain!

About Megan’s condition: 

Megan’s RSD journey began during the winter of her junior year in High School when she slipped and put her hand out to brace her fall.  She suffered nerve compression in her left wrist and shortly after started noticing symptoms from her hand to her shoulder.  The following summer she was a passenger in a car, riding to a summer bible camp. They were stopped at a traffic light and a truck hit them from behind.  She was diagnosed with strained muscles in her neck and over the next few months, the RSD symptoms began to spread throughout her whole body.

Megan is young (age 22) and hopeful that her chances for abatement of the symptoms and partial or near complete relief from the pain are very good.  Her upcoming Ketamine infusion treatments could have a major impact on her future.  

About the disease: 

RSD/CRPS is a chronic pain condition which affects the central nervous system affecting skin, joints, muscles, bones and sometimes impacting other organs.   

Megan’s Symptoms are:  Various degrees of burning pain in the skin and muscles, fatigue, extreme sensitivity to touch, trouble keeping food down, constant urge to urinate, headaches, blurry vision, trouble with motor skills, dizziness. 

Treatments she has had:  Megan has medical insurance and has spent most of her income over the years treating this condition.  She has had MRI studies, EMG/NCV studies, thermograms - among other tests.  She’s tried holistic approaches and altered her diet.  Megan’s been treated by medical doctors, neurologists, reflexologists, chiropractors, homeopaths, and to this point has not been able to get relief from her symptoms. 

One more treatment that she is scheduled for:  A leading doctor in the fight against CRPS is located in Philadelphia, PA which is 50 miles from where she lives.  He has pioneered the use of a drug called Ketamine which is a type of anesthetic which works on the brain and neurological system.  Megan is currently a patient of his and scheduled for an FDA-Approved 10-day infusion at the end of this summer beginning September 4th.  Unfortunately, her insurance does not cover this treatment which costs around $12,000.00.  

Here is a word from a close friend of Megan’s:

My name is Michael, and I received the privilege of being asked to write about Megan; to describe her personality so you can better understand who she is and why she needs your help.  I will start by asking you a simple question:  have you ever had the opportunity to meet someone who can’t stop smiling?  I have; the first time I met Megan over five years ago I realized I had just met someone different.  She wasn’t the type of person to frown when the sun wasn’t shining or when things didn’t go her way.  “Big deal!” you say, “I have met plenty of people like that!”  Well let me ask you just a few more questions.  Have you ever been dizzy to the point of collapsing?  Have you ever had an excruciating headache throughout the entire day?  Have you ever burned your hand on a stove, been sick with a stomach virus, or only gotten four hours of sleep a night?  Sure, we’ve all had these ailments a time or two.  Each one alone can be crippling and can ruin a perfectly good day.  That is why I was amazed to learn that Megan has RSD, a disorder of the nervous system, and she lives with the symptoms stated above every day.  I was amazed because even though she is in such pain and discomfort everyday she still looks on the bright side.  She has told me on more than one account that she is glad she is experiencing this disorder so she can better understand those people who suffer from similar ailments.  I am ashamed to admit when I get the stomach flu or I miss a night’s rest.  I never think about others who live with acid reflux, IBS, or Insomnia.   I just mumble and complain.  But Megan Doesn’t.  She refuses to let this disorder shut her in a room all day.  Instead she puts on a smile, and walks out the door searching for the first person walking down the street frowning to try and brighten their day.  I know countless people, more than she would be willing to admit, who have been affected by her positive attitude - MYSELF included.  But I must tell you - RSD is a disorder that doesn’t get better when left untreated.  No, just the opposite, it will continue to get worse.  I don’t want to see my dearest friend crippled by RSD.  So will you please join me in taking out a page from Megan’s book?  Let’s not focus on our own petty ailments, let’s help those who have some serious problems and disorders.  With Jesus leading (and us following) I know we can have an impact not only in Megan’s life, but in others like her as well.  This is Megan’s Hope!

A word from Megan: Thank you all for any help that you give, whether it's money or letting others know about my campaign!

story:
Early this year Yasmin Hopley was a fit and healthy 16 year old who had thought she had a bad knee. Today Yasmin is in a hospital bed at Royal Prince Alfred Hospital in Sydney, going through treatment for the rare and aggressive cancer, Clear Cell Sarcoma .

Yasmin has the fight of her life in front of her and all at a hospital more than five hours from home.  Yasmin is just starting her journey and we’re asking you to help her through the most difficult time of her young life. Donations to ease the family's burden are being accepted on this site so please help us help Yasmin.

story:
Thanks to everyone who made our crowdfunding campaign a success!  

HUM is now available directly from our website, check out www.meetHUM.com, to buy and for more information.


The vibrator, redesigned by physicists.  Sleek, minimal, intuitive. This is your gal. This is your little dude. Arduino hackable. An orgasm graph for every woman. The future of sex research. This is HUM.

On the weekend of the summer solstice this June, I did a soft PR launch of HUM, the world’s first robotic, artificially intelligent vibrator. By “soft launch” I mean I climbed on top of a table in my leather jacket at a party inside of a sailboat out at Treasure Island in the San Francisco Bay, held up a bottle of scotch and screamed, “MY NAME IS SUNNY AND I AM THE EVE OF ROBOTIC SEX.”
I am sober now but the sentiment stands. I have discovered something new and it is a sex toy created by multiple physicists.

PRESS/QUOTATIONS

"Scientists have just made a quantum leap in technology: the world's first artificially intelligent vibrator." - Whoopi Goldberg, The View 

"It sounds amazing. I think I should get one, I think the audience should get one." - Ashanti, record producer, guest co-host on The View

"While Hum has buttons, the idea is that you simply turn it on, and it’ll do all the work for you." - The Daily Dot

"Congratulations, boys. You have invented a new kind of sex." - Sunny, bio in Cosmo

"You only get a couple projects that stop you dead in your tracks and make you feel so lucky your job is to help shepherd ideas into the world...Hum is a dream project, it's a technology that caught up with fantasy." (Executive Producer of Shortbus and Hum Consultant, Alexis Fish)

"HUM is fascinating, not just from a recreational viewpoint, but for the potential for the data to create a new kind of science, for a better understanding of sex and sexuality.  After applying some of the same advanced mathematics and analysis that I've used for geophysics and civil engineering projects to data from HUM, I'm even more excited for the future of medical, scientific, and human aspects of knowledge that it bring." (Xavi Marti, Ph.D.)


MEET HUM



THE DESIGN

Because this was a complete reimagining of what a sex toy could be, the technologies for HUM had to be designed and built from the ground up.  From the 3D printed internal structure, to the custom circuitry and pressure sensors, to thousands of lines of sophisticated computer code, HUM is a toy built like no other.

The innovations show on the outside as well.  HUM is clad in a single piece of soft, ultrapure, medical grade silicone.  The long-lasting lithium battery inside is charged wirelessly, with the included charging base.  With the wireless charging, there is no need for ports, jacks, or any kind of break in the surface.  

The physical construction not only makes HUM beautiful, but it is durable, hygienic, and completely waterproof as well.

Of course, all of this hardware would be nothing without the brains to make it all work.  We used our decades of experience writing advanced computer code - ranging from large scale physics simulations, to signal processing and data analysis, to computer control of laboratory experiments - to bring our new toy to life.


<cutaway view of HUM, showing the dual motors, battery, and electronics>


TECH SPECS

  • RESPONSIVE - feels you touch and move, and responds back
  • WATERPROOF - completely submersible, durable, and easily cleaned
  • HYGENIC - soft, seamless, medical grade silicone, sterilizable
  • WIRELESS - charges using the Qi charging base (included)
  • MADE IN THE USA

THE EXPERIENCE

HUM is also one of the easiest, simplest toys to use - all the technology is on the inside.  Because of the sensors, you don’t even need to press buttons.  HUM feels your touch and motion, and creates vibrations that change in harmony with your body.  Just turn it on and use it.

HUM creates a personal, intimate experience, that nothing else on the market can provide.  It's a toy for the new generation, a complete rethinking of what a sex toy can be.  With HUM, you create an experience as unique as you.

Below is just one example.  It’s a graph of data taken from HUM’s maiden voyage.    HUM can “see” the orgasm (can you?), and responds in sync, drawing out and accentuating the experience.  



ARDUINO BASED PROGRAMMING

In order to create HUM, we had to build our own electronics and code.

But why reinvent the wheel?  The coding system used in HUM is based on
the wildly popular, open-source Arduino standard for microcontrollers.
For those feeling up to the challenge, HUM allows you to write and
upload your own code.  The interface gives you access to to all the
hardware, including the sensors, buttons, and motors, as well as advanced DSP processing, such as filters and running statistics.

Programs are uploaded via bluetooth, which can also be used to
interface directly with the device.  The possibilities are up to you …
Of course, if writing code for a vibrator isn't your thing, no problem.  HUM was made to work right out of the box ... just turn it on, and go!


GET HUMMED

We built HUM from the ground up.  From the 3D printed internal frame, to the custom electronics and pressure sensors, to the seamless overmolding technology, the design required innovation at every corner.

Most of this was done in our workshop.  For scaled up production, we are working with local manufacturing partners with decades of experience manufacturing high quality medical devices and consumer electronics.

We have built our prototypes and are ready to finalize our design, begin large scale manufacture, and bring HUM to the world.  Support our IndieGoGo campaign, and be one of the first people to experience the future of sex toys.

In order to make sure that you get the best possible device, delivered on time, we are targeting April to finish manufacturing and deliver the first round of devices.  These will be shipped on a rolling basis, depending on demand.



<the team - Aaron, Sunny and Jonathan>
story_txt:
Thanks to everyone who made our crowdfunding campaign a success!  HUM is now available directly from our website, check out www.meetHUM.com, to buy and for more information.The vibrator, redesigned by physicists.  Sleek, minimal, intuitive. This is your gal. This is your little dude. Arduino hackable. An orgasm graph for every woman. The future of sex research. This is HUM.

On the weekend of the summer solstice this June, I did a soft PR launch of HUM, the world’s first robotic, artificially intelligent vibrator. By “soft launch” I mean I climbed on top of a table in my leather jacket at a party inside of a sailboat out at Treasure Island in the San Francisco Bay, held up a bottle of scotch and screamed, “MY NAME IS SUNNY AND I AM THE EVE OF ROBOTIC SEX.”I am sober now but the sentiment stands. I have discovered something new and it is a sex toy created by multiple physicists.

PRESS/QUOTATIONS"Scientists have just made a quantum leap in technology: the world's first artificially intelligent vibrator." - Whoopi Goldberg, The View "It sounds amazing. I think I should get one, I think the audience should get one." - Ashanti, record producer, guest co-host on The View"While Hum has buttons, the idea is that you simply turn it on, and it’ll do all the work for you." - The Daily Dot"Congratulations, boys. You have invented a new kind of sex." - Sunny, bio in Cosmo"You only get a couple projects that stop you dead in your tracks and make you feel so lucky your job is to help shepherd ideas into the world...Hum is a dream project, it's a technology that caught up with fantasy." (Executive Producer of Shortbus and Hum Consultant, Alexis Fish)"HUM is fascinating, not just from a recreational viewpoint, but for the potential for the data to create a new kind of science, for a better understanding of sex and sexuality.  After applying some of the same advanced mathematics and analysis that I've used for geophysics and civil engineering projects to data from HUM, I'm even more excited for the future of medical, scientific, and human aspects of knowledge that it bring." (Xavi Marti, Ph.D.)MEET HUMTHE DESIGNBecause this was a complete reimagining of what a sex toy could be, the technologies for HUM had to be designed and built from the ground up.  From the 3D printed internal structure, to the custom circuitry and pressure sensors, to thousands of lines of sophisticated computer code, HUM is a toy built like no other.The innovations show on the outside as well.  HUM is clad in a single piece of soft, ultrapure, medical grade silicone.  The long-lasting lithium battery inside is charged wirelessly, with the included charging base.  With the wireless charging, there is no need for ports, jacks, or any kind of break in the surface.  The physical construction not only makes HUM beautiful, but it is durable, hygienic, and completely waterproof as well.Of course, all of this hardware would be nothing without the brains to make it all work.  We used our decades of experience writing advanced computer code - ranging from large scale physics simulations, to signal processing and data analysis, to computer control of laboratory experiments - to bring our new toy to life.

<cutaway view of HUM, showing the dual motors, battery, and electronics>


TECH SPECS





RESPONSIVE - feels you touch and move, and responds back


WATERPROOF - completely submersible, durable, and easily cleaned


HYGENIC - soft, seamless, medical grade silicone, sterilizable


WIRELESS - charges using the Qi charging base (included)

MADE IN THE USA


THE EXPERIENCE
HUM is also one of the easiest, simplest toys to use - all the technology is on the inside.  Because of the sensors, you don’t even need to press buttons.  HUM feels your touch and motion, and creates vibrations that change in harmony with your body.  Just turn it on and use it.
HUM creates a personal, intimate experience, that nothing else on the market can provide.  It's a toy for the new generation, a complete rethinking of what a sex toy can be.  With HUM, you create an experience as unique as you.


Below is just one example.  It’s a graph of data taken from HUM’s maiden voyage.    HUM can “see” the orgasm (can you?), and responds in sync, drawing out and accentuating the experience.  







ARDUINO BASED PROGRAMMINGIn order to create HUM, we had to build our own electronics and code.But why reinvent the wheel?  The coding system used in HUM is based onthe wildly popular, open-source Arduino standard for microcontrollers.For those feeling up to the challenge, HUM allows you to write andupload your own code.  The interface gives you access to to all thehardware, including the sensors, buttons, and motors, as well as advanced DSP processing, such as filters and running statistics.Programs are uploaded via bluetooth, which can also be used tointerface directly with the device.  The possibilities are up to you …Of course, if writing code for a vibrator isn't your thing, no problem.  HUM was made to work right out of the box ... just turn it on, and go!


GET HUMMED
We built HUM from the ground up.  From the 3D printed internal frame, to the custom electronics and pressure sensors, to the seamless overmolding technology, the design required innovation at every corner.
Most of this was done in our workshop.  For scaled up production, we are working with local manufacturing partners with decades of experience manufacturing high quality medical devices and consumer electronics.
We have built our prototypes and are ready to finalize our design, begin large scale manufacture, and bring HUM to the world.  Support our IndieGoGo campaign, and be one of the first people to experience the future of sex toys.
In order to make sure that you get the best possible device, delivered on time, we are targeting April to finish manufacturing and deliver the first round of devices.  These will be shipped on a rolling basis, depending on demand.




<the team - Aaron, Sunny and Jonathan>

story:
Jeanette is a beautiful, young, 42 year old who just got dealt a bad hand. She is determined to beat this cancer, but she will need a little financial assistance until she is back to full strength.

She is undergoing chemotherapy and is not strong enough to work right now, However, she still needs to pay her medical bills and it is important for her to eat a healthy diet at this time. She needs our help so she can focus on getting better and not have to worry about making ends meet.

We hope you will consider making a donation to help Jeanette get through the rest of this year while she finishes chemotherapy and surgery.

The beef and beer benefit will be held as follows:

Date: Saturday, November 29th
Time: 1 pm to 4 pm. 
Location: Tom N Jerry's Sports Bar, 1006 MacDade Boulevard, Folsom, PA.
CLICK FOR MAP

There will be food, beer, soda and a DJ. As well as baskets to win and a 50/50 raffle. The cost per ticket is $25.

Any donation you can make will help. Thank you so much for your support.

The Scully Family

story: Alex and his father were burned in an accident. Alex was burned on over 50% of his body and will need to be in the hospital for 3-4 months and will require 20 or more surgeries.

story:
Quidditch

Yes, you read that right. Muggle Quidditch is a real thing, created by fans of Harry Potter at Middlebury College in 2005. The game is played holding broomsticks between the legs, and can best be compared to a combination of rugby, handball, and dodgeball with hockey style line changes and two people trying to take a tennis ball in a sock from a person dressed in yellow. Since its beginning eight years ago, the sport has grown to include over 800 teams from all around the world, with a governing body, the International Quidditch Association, made to facilitate competitive play.

Who We Are

We are Owls Quidditch. The team practices at and primarily made up of students from Florida Atlantic University in Boca Raton, FL, but is open to anyone in the area that wants to join. Currently the team is placed 117 in the league after a strong effort at the Southern Regionals, placing seventh, one place shy of a bid for World Cup VI in Kissimmee, FL on April 13th and 14th. Now the team has gotten a spot in Division 2 of the World Cup, but needs help to get there.


Why We Need Help

I can already tell what you're going to be wondering, "Why does a Florida team need help getting up to the World Cup when it's in Florida?" Suffice to say is that we're broke college students. Unlike last year, the university is not giving the team any money, save for a small loan that wouldn't even cover the cost of gas to get the team to the cup. Because of the lack of funding we already had to drop out of one tournament, choosing to save our own money in order to make the trip to the regional championship in Augusta, GA. Because of that we have all but completely expended our own personal funds, leaving us very little to make the trip to the Cup and any tournaments in the future. Every little bit helps. Even if you can't donate, spreading the word around about this will be just as important. Anything you can do to help us will get our undying gratitude!

story:
How it all began....

Chris & Missy Wallace; founder of Wild Oats, stumbled upon their creation by chance and circumstance.  We had just embarked on a new adventure, a small coffee and cupcake shop in North Carolina. We would sometimes put in 15 hour days starting as early as 3am. We had very little time to prepare a healthy breakfast and found ourselves eating unhealthy alternatives. Our kitchen was full of great ingredients for baking, rolled oats, brown sugar, nuts, coconut and dried fruits etc.  We had a hard time finding quick oatmeal that wasn't loaded with sugar and artifical flavors so we decided to play around with some of our baking ingredients.  After one taste we realized we were on to something! We were so pleased with the results that we decided to offer it to our customers. The only problem was the packaging. The business that we had was certified under the Department of Agricutlure which meant that all of the items that we served had to be in disposable containers. We knew that we had to find something that had a lid but would also hold up to boiling water. We finally settled on "soup" containers. They were not only the perfect size to hold a generous serving of oats but they could also withstand the high temps. We started offering the oatmeal to our customers and it was a huge sucess! We could not keep the shelves stocked. We have since then sold our coffee shop in North Carolina and have relocated to Charleston South Carolina. We want to offer the same convenient and healthy breakfast to other coffee shops and have been working hard on creating accounts in our new hometown. Since adding the online ordering system we realize that we will not be able to keep up with the demand of prodcution, shipping and handling.  We have decided to partner with Missy's mom "Jean" who lost her job in July due to breast cancer. Jean will be handling all of the internet orders, shipping and handling for the midwest region.

 

About our oats....

What better way to gain the strength and energy to carry you through a hectic morning schedule than with a steaming bowl of freshly cooked oatmeal? Wild Oats all-natural oatmeal allows you to taste food in its natural state. All-natural oatmeal means that we use only 100% natural ingredients! No GMOs, crazy chemical treatments or artificial ingredients or flavors. Each handy individual serving is fiber and protein packed, with special ingredients that make for a hearty, delicious taste. We only use the good stuff like organic brown sugar, toasted almonds, cranberries, blueberries, natural walnuts and much more! The result is a tasty and quick breakfast that you can feel good about! Wild oats come conveninetly packaged in indiviudal servings, all the consumer has to do is add 1 cup of boiling water. Within 3 minutes you have a quick tasty breakfast on the go. These are great for grabbing on your way out the door, traveling, camping, also great for coffee shops, offices and cafeterias.

Wild Oats currently comes in 6 great flavors: PAPA BEAR, TRIPLE BERRY, SUNNY MORNING, JUST OATS, SPICED CHAI & CARAMEL APPLE. For more information check out our website at www.wild4oats.com

 

We will use the funding from our campaign to improve our packaging, marketing and wholesale supplies that we need in order to produce a more efficient product. We also need to secure a kitchen for the midwest production. The amount we are asking for will not be the full amount that we need but we hope that we will go above and beyond our goal.

 

Benefits of Oatmeal

Oatmeal Benefit #1   RICH IN FIBER. Oatmeal is rich in fiber, making it beneficial for the heart and the digestive process. The soluble fiber in oatmeal reduces low-density lipoprotein (LDL), the ‘bad cholesterol’ in your digestive tract. It cleanses out your colon and lets your digestive tract properly function.

Oatmeal Benefit #2   LOW IN CHOLESTEROL, SODIUM AND CALORIES. Certainly, oatmeal is the friendliest food for anyone who suffers from high blood pressure and for those who have some weight management issues. It has been found in studies that those who eat more oats are less likely to develop heart disease.

Oatmeal Benefit #3   GOOD NUMBER OF PHYTOCHEMICALS According to the American Cancer Society, phytochemicals and the insoluble fiber in oats help the body fight against toxic bile acids. This helps lower the risk of cancer.

Oatmeal Benefit #4   PLENTY of B VITAMINS. Vitamin B in oats helps the brain and the nervous system to function properly. If you want to make your memory alert, then start to have some oatmeal each day.

Oatmeal Benefit #5   NATURAL FATS FOR THE SKIN. Oats are rich in natural lubricating fats which help prevent dry and itchy skin. The fats even leave a thin layer of protection for the skin. Oats also let your skin get rid of acne and impurities.

Oatmeal Benefit #6   CARBOHYDRATES FOR ENERGY. While being low in calories and cholesterol, oats have high amounts of carbohydrates, making it a perfect meal for those who are dieting. Oatmeal will keep you full for hours and keep your energy level high in the morning.Oats are even great for an afternoon pick me up!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute and we completely understand that, you can still help in a huge way....

  •  Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
**Update**

Dennis is SO thankful for all the contributions!! Your comments were very encouraging. Many people didn't have a chance to donate and have asked where they can send their contributions. If you are one of those people, you can visit Northland National Bank or send your contributions to the address below. Thank you all for your support!!

Northland National Bank
c/o Dennis Shaul One Last Wish Fund
99 NE 72nd St
Gladstone, MO 64118

____________________________________________________________________________

Dennis fought testicular cancer only to be diagnosed with pancreatic cancer in Dec 2010. He was given 6 months on Monday, October 15th and they are arranging for hospice.

He was a mail carrier for many years and made time to get to know everyone he delivered to. He's kind, unique and a fighter. He's battled this ugly disease for much longer than expected.

Dennis is my brother's father-in-law. I remember coming across this website when the bus monitor was bullied. What a great website. This popped into my head when I thought of Dennis' last wish. He wanted to visit the beach, one last time.

These funds will pay for 2 round trip tickets and hotel, to Destin FL. I searched on Travelocity and this was the exact price. The hotel is WaterColor Inn and Resort. It's right on the beach and it would be a 4 night stay. His wife has been by his side through this and I believe they would be pretty surprised to get to take another trip to the beach.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please help get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Please pray for strength and healing!! All things are possible through The Lord.

story:
At 23 weeks pregnant Lauren Chunn Thomas's water broke and she was rushed to Birmingham hospital (2 hours away) to be on bed rest for the remainder of her pregnancy.  On January 26, 2014 at 24 weeks Lauren began to have complications and baby Ella Grey was born weighing 1.11lbs and  13" long.  We are raising as much money as we can for this sweet family as they have a long road ahead of them.  These funds will help them with medical bills and travel expenses along with everyday living expenses.  Lauren's husband Josh is a former marine and is also unable to work due to an accident he was recently in. Please keep this precious family in your daily prayers and pray for Emry, Lauren's 3 year old daughter as they also struggle with being away from her.

Please like "Prayers for Ella" on facebook to keep up with sweet baby Ella Grey!

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Prayers-for-Ella/359700030838851

"For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord"  Jeremiah 29:11

story:
Meet our beautiful daughter, Gigi:

She is a fraternal twin and has had some catching up to do since her birth six months ago. She was born premature and had a hard time gaining/keeping her weight up. After six months of hard work she is healthy and plumping up. Now, we have to address some of the other issues she has associated with her birth.

Gigi has a tough case of Plagiocephaly (flat head) on one side of her head. This is common with twins, especially Twin 'A' (as Twin 'A' is usually the twin closest to the pelvis/the first one out). We've worked with our doctor these last months using positional therapy and our Gigi's head has been stubbornly holding on to its wedge shape. It has been recommended that we consider Cranial Orthotic Therapy (a helmet) for her (random baby in COT gear below).

 

In some cases, not treating this condition can result in jaw issues, misaligned facial features, social issues and, some studies suggest, it could even affect learning outcomes in school. Fortunately, all of these outcomes have a high probability being addressed with the proper therapy, at the prime age.

Unfortunately, OHIP and my private insurance does not cover this treatment. We are going to Sick Kid's Hospital for further assessment. We have to prepare to pay for the helmet up front as the imaging they use is only useful for three days. Should we not pay up-front, we will have to wait for another appointment, and Gigi's condition is time sensitive (her head is most malleable at her current age...weeks can make a difference for her whole lifetime). 

Should the specialist, upon further enquiry, decide against using a helmet, Mike and I would like to donate any funds received to a deserving family (like our own) who is in need of a helmet.

It is hard for us to ask for help, even though we need to. Providing for twins (and our older daughter) on a waiter's wages is challenging, but we work hard to make it a reality. These sort of complications make it that more difficult to navigate the financial pressures we face. We love all three of our daughters and want the best for them all—even our littlest member.

In our opinion, this is a win-win situation for those who donate. If, by some small chance, Gigi is spared having to go through this treatment—some baby who isn't so lucky will get the gift of a lifetime. Any excess funds we are blessed enough to receive (beyond the funding of one helmet for one child) will be donated to Sick Kid's Hospital. This will change some child's life, in a real way.

If you can't donate money, please forward this to your friends and family. If you, as so many of our friends are, a starving artist or craftsperson who can't donate money: we would love an in-kind donation to pass along to our top donors.

Unfortunately, OHIP and my private
insurance does not cover this treatment. We are going to Sick Kid's
Hospital for further assessment. We have to prepare to pay for the
helmet up front as the imaging they use is only useful for three
days.  Should we not pay up-front, we will have to wait for
another appointment, and Gigi's condition is time sensitive (her head
is most malleable at her current age...weeks can make a difference
for her whole lifetime). Should the specialist, upon further
enquiry, decide against using a helmet, Mike and I would like to
donate any funds received to a deserving family (like our own) who is
in need of a helmet.  

It is hard for us to ask for help, even
though we need to. Providing for twins (and our older daughter) on a
waiter's wages is challenging, but we work hard to make it a reality.
These sort of complications make it that more difficult to navigate
the financial pressures we face. We love all three of our daughters
and want the best for them all—even our littlest member.
In our opinion, this is a win-win
situation for those who donate.  If, by some small chance, Gigi is
spared having to go through this treatment—some baby who isn't so
lucky will get the gift of a lifetime. Any excess funds we are blessed enough to receive (beyond the funding of one helmet for one child) will be donated to Sick Kid's Hospital. This will change some
child's life, in a real way.  

If you can't donate money, please
forward this to your friends and family.  If you, as so many of our
friends are, a starving artist or craftsperson who can't donate
money: we would love an in-kind donation to pass along to our top
donors.

story:
NEW:  MEN'S FITNESS

http://www.mensfitness.com/gear/workout-gear/the-coolest-health-and-fitness-gadgets-at-ces-2013?page=8

 

VERT Fitness jump measurement device! NOW every JUMP gets MEASURED! 

 

1.  FITNESS JUMP ROPE:  How many jumps did you do in your jump rope routine?  Challenge yourself, challenge your friends!

2.  TRYOUTS / Combines:  NO NEED for slap stick machines anymore.  With VERT you simply attach VERT to your waist and get immediate vertical jump measurments without the hassle and time wasted with traditional vertical jump tests.

3.  VOLLEYBALL:  How many times did you jump during practice or a game?  VERT counts all that for you to make sure you stay in peak performance as well as prevent injuries.  (It also measure how high your Spike, Block or jump serve is so that you can perfect or game!)  See below for full coaching player management system

4.  BASKETBALL:  What's your VERT?  Now you know.  Compete, challenge, compare, and share your results with your friends (or competition).

5.  EXTREME SPORTS: in your own Backyard!  Attach to your BMX bike and see how high your bunny hop was without guessing.  It's like being in your own Xgames!

WHAT CAN YOU DO WITH YOUR VERT MEASURMENT?

VERT is a fitness jump device worn near the waist of an athlete that measures every leap and transmits the data to a smart phone or tablet.  You can see all jump measurements immediately on the VERT device and simultaneously on any smart phone or tablet with the downloadable VERT SKILZ app or VERT coach app.  What was traditionally available with special stationary equipment to determine jump measurement, can now be done anywhere, anytime in real-time.

VERT unit in hand.  Measurements: length 1.96” x width 0.31” x height 0.86”

Designed to be small and discreet, the VERT device is worn by an athlete and allows the user to know his or her vertical measurement right on the device via OLED, or wirelessly in real-time from the sideline via a smart phone or tablet.

VERT SKILZ app for smart phone.

Why should athletes have all the fun?

Spectators can follow an athlete’s performance as it happens on their smart device. Coaches can monitor the athlete’s performance, fans can follow their favorite players and parents can better enjoy their kids’ games…it’s fun for everyone!

VERT COACH app for smart tablets.

VERT coach app player management system designed for smart tablets.  Multiple player data analysis including: Amount of jumps, average jumps, time in game, last vert and highest vert.  Volley VERT coach app also has player analysis tab including game graphics, season analysis tab, top 10 team rank tab, and coach note tab.

 

VERT SPORT MODE releases

We are planning on releasing free updates and different modes for all vertical jump sports. VERT 1.0 is for any activity that involves jumping like basketball, volleyball or health & fitness such as jump rope.  Additional modes on the app will be released such as skateboard, BMX and cycle sports, football, track & field, etc.  If you want to know how high or how often you jumped – the VERT device will tell you in an instant.  Skateboarders will know their VERT on a ramp and freestyle BMX athletes will know their VERT on a bunny hop.  Whether the athlete’s objective is better fitness or performance, VERT’s feedback will have a more accurate measurement that was not previously available.

VERT unit will be available with different attachments including clip, active waist band and we are working on partnerships with apparal brands to have special pocket in active wear.

 

VERT TECHNICAL DATA

VERT is a wearable miniature inertial measurement unit (IMU), with a very high precision 3X gyroscope and high precision high rate 3X accelerometer.  VERT unit calculates motion in all direction using a built-in ARM Cortex M3.  The VERT unit has a proprietary algorithm that has over 53 simultaneous calculations to measure vertical height to within 96% accuracy.  VERT is smaller than a matchbox and can be worn or mounted virtually anywhere.  VERT has a built-in OLED display for instant display. VERT also has built-in Bluetooth 4.0, which communicates with proprietary VERT SKILZ app in iOS and Android device. VERT SKILZ app syncs with VERT and displays results in real-time.

Requirements:

  • iOS devices with Bluetooth 4.0 (iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, new iPad, New Touch, mini iPad) 
  • Android devices supporting Bluetooth Low Energy, running Android 4.0 and newer.

 

PRESS

MEN'S FITNESS:  http://www.mensfitness.com/gear/workout-gear/the-coolest-health-and-fitness-gadgets-at-ces-2013?page=8

CNET:  http://ces.cnet.com/8301-34441_1-57562607/how-high-can-you-jump-measure-with-vert/

COOLTHINGS.COM  http://www.coolthings.com/health-and-fitness-gadgets/

PTC.COM  http://blogs.ptc.com/2013/01/09/best-8-off-beat-gadgets-from-ces-2013/

 

COMMENTS?  QUESTIONS? would like to discuss business partnerships with Mayfonk Athletic?  Please contact us at info@mayfonk.com

story:
A Little About Cory

My name is Cory Jacobson and I’m 22 years old. I’ve lived in Colorado Springs for about 14 years now and I love it! I moved here from Minnesota and I’m definitely a fan of the Colorado weather; even though it can be bi-polar at times haha! I moved here with my mom Cheryl, my dad Dan, and my younger sister Kate. My sister and I are both affected by a genetic disability called Spinal Muscular Atrophy, type 2; or SMA for short. It’s a neuromuscular disease that affects all of our muscles. I require the use of an electric wheelchair and also assistance with most of my activities throughout the day. I graduated high school in 2008 and graduated with my Associates degree from Pikes Peak community college in December of 2010. I met my husband, Ian, while attending college. He and I got married in April 2011. Since being married, Ian has become my primary care giver. I have a nursing aide who comes during the weekdays to take care of me while Ian is gone at work. He’s a paralegal specialist in the US Army and is stationed at Ft. Carson. Military life can be a difficult one at times, but I certainly would not trade it for anything. I strongly believe that everything my husband and I have been through together has made us so much stronger; whether it’s struggles related to his job, challenges that are brought on by my disability, or just any type of difficulties that a marriage can bring. We’re not just stronger as a couple, but stronger individuals as well. We recently moved into our own place and while we love having our own space, it has been a unique experience to say the least trying to learn how to manage all of our struggles on our own. I have never lived away from my parents, so I was used to having someone always available to take care of me. Ian and I are still getting adjusted to living on our own, but it has been a wonderful experience and we’ve been tackling each obstacle we face together. Right now we’re working on paying for an accessible wheelchair accessible van. We’re a one-income home so affording expensive things like a van can be a challenge. But as I said before, we take on each challenge together and I know we’ll figure out a way to conquer this one as well. We're asking our community, friends, and family to help us raise the funds to pay for an accessible van. 

What We Need & What You Get

We're trying to raise $13,000 in 120 days! All of the funds we raise go directly towards the cost of a van. We're currently coming up with unique perks of things that you'll receive in return for oyur contribution! A couple of examples of things that I'm considering are hand painted pictures done by me or hand made bracelets also made by me.

The Impact

Helping Ian and I fund a wheelchair accessible vehicle will have a huge impact on both of our lives. We currently live off of one income because I am unable to work. I've created this site in hopes to find a way to help contribute more so in any possible way I can. Having a wheelchair accessible van gives Ian and I the freedom to be an independent, adult couple. That alone means the world to us.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand some people can't contribute financially, but that isn't the only way you can help us! Share this link with anyone and everyone you can; that alone can help us get the word out and we'll love you for it! 

 

For more information, feel free to email me (Cory) at c.jacobson26@yahoo.com

story:
No More Frigid Fingers! These Self-Heating Gloves Keep Your Fingers Warm

What happens when you blend multiple high tech performance yarns and turn them into a glove? You get a comfortable fit that looks like a regular fashionable glove, but performs like a therapeutic device for people with Raynaud’s and other circulatory diseases.

This combination of three elements: your skin, the environment and special high tech yarns work in unison to trigger this PATENT PENDING heat generating technology. The result is, your fingers stay warm.

The UNIQKNITS™ gloves looks great while helping you feel great. These are the only gloves on the market to incorporate this combination of hi-tech fibers that work together resulting in a unique self-heating ability. There are no batteries or wires to get in your way, no charger or replacement battery to carry.

We use state of the art knitting technology – similar to a 3D printer – to produce seamless gloves that are comfortable to wear and long-lasting. You can even text while wearing them!

If you are one of the estimated 28 million Americans who suffer with white, numb fingers even in mild weather, you’ll love these gloves as they can minimize your discomfort in cool to chilly environments.

When you put the gloves on, the technology in the yarn is triggered by your skin contact. The yarns interact with one another and your skin to generate and retain heat. We’ve tested them extensively.

The Testing Process

First, we attach temperature sensors to the fingertips of our tester. The fingertips are the most affected when a hand gets cold because the blood vessels start shutting down. Next, he puts on two different gloves and enters a walk-in refrigerator where he’ll stay for an hour.

4 times a minute we take a reading. We’re testing gloves on each hand. Sometimes they’re both ours, sometimes a competing glove.

At the end of the test session, we compare the data points and archive them.

Here’s how our gloves compared to other Raynaud's gloves already on the market:

The two top performing gloves are ours... you can see how well they retained our tester’s body heat…!

There are no cumbersome batteries or wires. These look like any other off–the- shelf gloves. You can keep them stashed in your coat pocket or bag and pull them out anytime you need them.

Currently, we have four types of gloves with more in the design stages. 

When your chosen perk includes gloves, we will follow up to get your color and size preferences!

UNIQKNITS™ Original Glove

The UNIQKNITS™ Original Glove uses highly engineered yarns specially designed to look good and fit well. The seamless construction makes them comfortable and durable. The glove is machine washable. These are most effective in cool to chilly environments, including Fall and early Spring weather and even air conditioning, down to temperatures in the low 40’s °F.  

 For colder weather, we offer our Winter Outer Gloves that incorporate our proprietary technology.


Winter Outer Gloves

UNIQKNITS™ Fully Fashioned Extra Fine Merino Glove

Available in both solid colors and, in the near future striated color combinations, we use the finest extra fine merino wool also made them machine washable! Like the Original Glove, they’re knitted using 3D knitting technology that produces finished gloves in one piece, without seams.

Then, we insert a liner. That means you have TWO levels of warmth and better yet, our liner incorporates our proprietary, self-heating technology so your fingers stay toasty!


UNIQKNITS™ Rag Wool Sweater Knit Gloves

The UNIQKNITS™ Rag Wool Glove is knitted in a traditional rag wool color in a winter blend of 50% Wool / 50% Acrylic.

In addition, this glove contains our proprietary, patent pending liner for energy harvesting, heat generation and heat retention plus a technical insulating material for excellent wind resistance. This is the glove you’ll want to reach for on those blustery winter days to stay warm while looking great!


UNIQKNITS™ Snowflake Jacquard Sweater Knit Gloves

The UNIQKNITS™ Snowflake Jacquard Sweater Knit Glove incorporates a traditional sweater jacquard motif knitted in winter warm 100% Acrylic.

Like our EXTRA FINE MERINO GLOVE and our RAG WOOL SWEATER KNIT GLOVES, the SNOWFLAKE JACQUARD SWEATER KNIT GLOVE includes our proprietary, patent pending liner for energy harvesting, heat generation and heat retention.

Together, the good looks of the Snowflake Jacquard Sweater Knit Gloves + our patent pending liner will keep your hands warm when the weather’s cold! 

UNIQKNITS™ is a fashion tech brand that blends wearable technology with fashion to soothe your symptoms while keeping you looking great.


About the Team:

George Szekely

A Digital Electronics Engineer by education and with extensive materials engineering background, George has served as General Manager of the Tyco Electronics Automation Group and spent 3 years in Shanghai as Regional Director for Asia-Pacific.

He’s excited to apply his experience to developing a product that helps people feel great.

Gabor Stein

Gabor has experience at every level of the apparel business and is a successful serial entrepreneur.

He’s worked for DuPont as a development engineer, served as head of R&D for the apparel division of Malden Mills (inventors of PolarTec fleece), launched his first textile company, scaled it up to 1,500 employees and eventually sold it to General Mills, Inc. Several more successful ventures have followed over the years.

Sid Estreicher

With deep product design and technical product development experience in the fashion industry, Sid is our chief designer and tester.

Sid served sixteen years at Liz Claiborne as the Director of Research and Development. While there he evaluated prospective factories and established a knit development studio that allowed Liz designers to develop their garment concepts before sending them to overseas factories to be created in mass quantity. 

Herbert Quinn

Herb is our sales guy. He’s been a men’s sportswear buyer and worked in sales with companies like Malden Mills and Kandahar Sportswear. He served as President of Leonardo Strassi.

Later, Herb established his own sales and marketing company which primarily serviced the military as well as companies such as Geoffrey Beene, Oscar de la Renta, and Capital Mercury.

story:
Atmotube PLUS will constantly monitor the air around you and immediately alert you when it's not safe.

 

 

Atmotube Makes You Smarter about the Air You Breathe

Atmotube can help to:

  • Reduce exposure to harmful gases.

  • Prevent allergy or asthma attacks caused by polluted air and identify sources of air pollution.

  • Avoid polluted areas by getting alert notifications if the air is not safe.

  • Be aware of weather changes.

  • Monitor air temperature and humidity to stay in a comfort zone and feel better.

 

Atmotube PLUS is a wearable, portable device that monitors the quality and safety of the air you breathe. With more precise and reliable sensors, it accurately measures real-time air pollution caused by harmful gases and a wide range of Volatile Organic compounds (VOCs) like acetone, methanol, benzene, ethanol, toluene, xylene, and formaldehyde. It also measures atmospheric pressure, temperature, and humidity. 

 

Features

Atmotube PLUS uniquely combines style with functionality, using the most innovative sensors to provide real-time measurements of indoor and outdoor air. We've done a lot of work to maximize the value of Atmotube PLUS features and enhance user experience.

 

Why Atmotube Plus is better than other trackers

  • Advanced: features the newest generation of sensors for the instant detection of harmful gases, no calibration required – it just works!
  • Compact: a set of high-quality air pollution sensors are now packed into a small and stylish handheld device
  • Portable: securely hooks on a bag or belt, with up to 7 days battery life so you can take it anywhere
  • Multi-purpose: also includes a weather station with atmospheric pressure, temperature, and humidity sensors
  • Connected: all data is shown in our mobile app and shared to our global air quality map

 

How it works

The sensors inside Atmotube keep constant track of the air parameters. Every two seconds, your Atmotube will measure concentration of VOCs, temperature, humidity, and barometric pressure, then send them all to your smartphone via Bluetooth (BT5.0).

The Atmotube mobile app is free and available for iOS 9 and Android 4.3+ smartphones with Bluetooth LE support. Its clear and simple user interface shows current air quality readings and helps you track the history of your measurements and your personal air score. If the air quality gets below certain point, you will immediately receive an alert notification. 

With Atmotube, you can also contribute to global air quality data crowdsourcing: all gathered data on air quality will display on your personal map and, if you wish, your gathered data can be shared with others via the Global Air Quality Map.


 

 

Why We Need to Care About Air Quality

Air quality has a significant impact on our lives. Good outdoor and indoor air quality is crucial to our well-being. An average person automatically takes over 20,000 breaths daily, and unless we encounter a problem, we never think about WHAT we breathe in and how air components can affect our bodies. 

But, there are potential dangers lurking in the air, such as VOCs, and various harmful gases - both indoors and outside. Moreover, according to WHO, 92% of the world’s population lives in places where air quality levels exceed WHO limits.  

Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs) are emitted as gases from liquids or solids and can have short and long-term adverse health effects on respiratory systems. Over time, exposure to VOCs has been linked to an increased risk of heart disease, stroke, liver and brain damage, and even cancer.

Recently, more and more people are becoming weather-dependent and are susceptible to diseases such as asthma, COPD, and allergies. Air pollution can worsen or even cause lung diseases, but today there is a very little understanding of what exact levels of air pollution affect our health.

At the same time, even very simple steps like improving ventilation, monitoring humidity, avoiding certain polluted areas, getting rid of aggressive household chemicals, or wearing a mask, can make a big difference. With Atmotube, you can easily control the air you breathe and eliminate potential danger before it has time to affect you.  Most people don't find out they've been exposed to toxic air until it's too late, so we decided to create these beautiful and functional devices that can seamlessly integrate into your life and alert you to potential danger in the air.
 

 

Make it a Part of Your Life

We designed Atmotube PLUS so that it can be used both indoors and outside.  Atmotube PLUS is innovative, portable, technologically advanced device is designed to be an integral part of your lifestyle. It can be with you everywhere, giving you actual information about air quality, pollution, and harmful gases right where you are. It will always be there for you and for those you care about most.   

The Impact 

The aggregated environmental data is shared to a Global Air Quality Map that is free for everyone to use. Atmotube PLUS is a personal contribution to global air pollution awareness, as well as a potential lifesaver for you and your family.

 

What We Need and What You Get

Help us to bring new Atmotube PLUS tracker into this world. Today, we need your support to be able to set up mass production and ship our very first batch of products.

 

Our special perks are exclusive for Indiegogo supporters! 

By supporting our project, you can:

  • Be the first to explore the endless possibilities of air quality control with Atmotube 
  • Order now and save up to 40% of expected retail price 
  • Make your personal contribution to global air quality control

 

PROJECT TIMELINE

 

 

Press about Atmotube 2.0

 

 

Our Team and Our Story

This beautiful product went through over 4 years of research and development, evolving its design and features into the Atmotube you see today.   We began design and engineering of our very first Atmotube back in 2014. In 2015, we launched it on Indiegogo; with the tremendous support of our backers and partners, we gathered 338% of our targeted goal.

Today, we have produced and shipped several thousand Atmotubes. They are now available on our website, Amazon, and by retail in many countries. We received tons of valuable feedback and accumulated lots of knowledge about specific air pollutants, sensor technologies, and our users’ wants and needs to create an even more useful and indispensable product.  

 

Over the last few years our team has grown from 6 to 16 people. We now have 11+ years of experience in research and development, industrial design, and software development for consumer electronics. Together we have worked on big projects for well-known companies, and now we are here to bring our very own product to market.

With your help, we'll be able to raise awareness about the importance of air quality, motivate people to spend more time in safer environments, and help people from sensitive and at-risk groups to feel more secure.

 

Risks and challenges

 

Share global news

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

What are the VOCs?

Volatile organic compounds (VOCs) are emitted as gases from certain solids or liquids. In fact, they may be emitted by a wide array of products, including paints and lacquers, paint strippers, cleaning supplies, household products such as varnishes and wax, cleaning and disinfecting, products, building materials (plywood and particleboard) and furnishings, office equipment such as copiers and printers, glues and adhesives.

 

VOCs can cause eye, nose, and throat irritation as well as headaches, loss of coordination, and nausea. They may also cause damage to the liver, kidney, and central nervous system. Some are suspected or known to cause cancer.

 

You can find the list of VOCs here: https://iaspub.epa.gov/sor_internet/registry/su...

Why should I use Atmotube?

People don’t realize how what’s in the air might affect our health. But there are potential dangers in the air around you. Atmotube device can help you to detect VOC pollutants and do proactive actions such as air ventilation, air purification or finding source of pollution.

How does Atmotube PLUS VOC sensor work?

Atmotube constantly monitors air pollution in real time. We utilize a MOX-based (Metal-oxide) sensor in our product. The functionality of a MOX gas sensor is based on the conductivity-change of the gas-sensitive MOX semi-conductor layers at gas exposure, which can be externally measured and analyzed. A specific MOX gas-sensitive layer reacts to oxidizable gases with increasing of the layer resistance and to reducible gases with decreasing of the layer resistance.

How often does it take measurements?

Atmotube PLUS take VOC measurements every 2 seconds and store it to the memory every 1 minute.

How long does it work on single charge?

Atmotube PLUS takes can work 1 week on a single charge.

How portable is it? How much does it weigh?

Atmotube PLUS only weighs 1.4 ounces (40 grams), so it’s perfectly portable, even pocketable. It has carabiner mount to let you to clip it anywhere, on any bag or even a key ring.

Do I need to download the app to use Atmotube?

Yes, Atmotube sends all measured data to your mobile phone via Bluetooth Low Energy (LE) protocol. You can download our free Atmotube app from Google Play or App Store.

Can I use Atmotube without the phone?

Yes, you can – Atmotube has internal memory to store data for several days. To detect current level of pollution you can press the button and check LED color. You can sync the data later with smartphone. If you need GPS location for the readings the phone need to be close to the Atmotube device.

Will Atmotube work with any Smartphone?

Atmotube is compatible with iOS 9+ devices and Android 4.3+ devices with Bluetooth Low Energy support.

Is the Atmotube mobile app free?

Absolutely!

Will I receive any alerts if the air quality is poor?

Yes, you will get immediate notification if Atmotube detects air quality lower than specific level to your smartphone. This notification is customizable via settings.

What is Air Quality Score?

Atmotube detects a very wide range of harmful gases, toxins, and volatile organic compounds. For your convenience, we created an accumulative parameter called Air Quality Score (AQS) that can instantly give you an understanding of the quality of air around. AQS changes from 0 (severely polluted air) to 100 (very clean) points. There’s a LED on the front of Atmotube. What does each color mean? The LED color represents the current Air Quality Score. (Red - severely polluted, Orange - very polluted, Yellow - polluted, Green - moderate, Blue - good).

Is Atmotube waterproof?

Atmotube design is meant to provide a good airflow for the sensors inside, so it can’t be waterproof at the same time. Please do not put it in water. What is the operating temperature of Atmotube? Recommended operating temperature for Atmotube sensors is from -5°C to +50°C.

How is Atmotube calibrated?

Each sensor will be pre-calibrated. Sensors have sophisticated embedded algorithms to perform automatic calibration over time.

How does the Air Quality Map work?

If you will decide to contribute to Global Map - your GPS coordinates will be linked with your AQS measurements, periodically uploaded to our secure cloud, and then will be aggregated on the air quality map. The map is available for public viewing.

Who can see my Air Quality data?

Only you can view your AQS history data. But you can share it on the map to make your contribution into the global air quality map.

What happens to the money you raise?

Your money will only be used to build your product - all funds pledged will be spent for tooling, manufacturing setup and component costs.

When will my Atmotube ship?

According to our plan we will start shipping Atmotube PLUS in early December 2018. Our first supporters will receive their orders first.

Where will you ship?

We ship Atmotubes worldwide!

What will Atmotube PLUS cost at retail?

The target retail price of Atmotube PLUS is $99 plus sales tax.

Does Atmotube come with a warranty?

Yes! We offer a 12 month manufacturer’s warranty on all our products.

How do I get ahold of our team?

Please contact info@atmotube.com.

Can I change or cancel my perk?

Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information on how to do this here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/categories/360000046767-Backers

 

To get a refund on your perk contribution while the campaign is active, please check https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367. After the campaign, we will evaluate refunds on a case-by-case basis but are not obligated to do so.

Problem backing us?

Please contact support@indiegogo.com.

I am a distributor. How do I contact you?

Please contact info@atmotube.com.

story:
Superthotics is the first genuinely personalized orthotic available without a doctor’s visit that can instantly relieve pain in the feet, ankles, knees, hips, and back. Superthotics provides the kind of custom support and alignment you used to only be able to get with expensive prescription orthotics costing $600 or more.

Its patented design uses customizable biodynamic balance inserts to keep your arch from collapsing in, correcting pronation and the angle at which your foot strikes the ground and providing a perfect fit for your unique gait. 

 

Many people suffer from pain in not only their feet but their ankles, shins, knees, hips, and back, but there’s an unexpected way to reduce or eliminate your pain, and it is through your FEET! 

From the annoying ache in your legs to the debilitating pain in your back, it could all trace back to your feet because your feet are the foundation of your entire body. 

And when your feet are out of alignment, your entire body is thrown out of alignment. 

When that foundation is healthy, and your feet are properly aligned, every part of you - from your ankles to your neck - has a solid base. But years of heavy use and just living your everyday life can wear out and damage that foundation. 

But what if there were a simple solution that could help realign your body and help you get through your day pain-free?

 

 

A doctor-prescribed orthotic can help you do just that. Orthotics slip into your shoe and work to strengthen and align your feet and ankles, distribute your weight evenly, correct imbalances, and, best of all, reduce the misery that comes from pain in your feet, ankles, knees, hips, and back.

But prescription orthotics aren’t the kind of inserts you find at the drug store. They normally require a doctor’s visit and can run you anywhere between $400-$600 since they’re not usually covered by insurance, making them out of reach for many suffering from pain.

 

We set out to create an orthotic that is both customizable AND affordable to help relieve pain for as many people as possible. 

 

Superthotics instantly corrects your foot and ankle alignment so your whole body goes back into alignment with a patented innovation that --up to now -- could only be achieved with a doctor-prescribed orthotic.

It’s precision molded with the same type of high-tech polymers as costly prescription orthotics and designed to last for many years of support and comfort. 

 The durable arch support helps reduce pain, improve balance and make walking and exercise more comfortable. 

The proprietary Bio-Lock Heel Cup stabilizes the heel and ankle, putting your foot into its correct alignment. And we've cushioned our Bio-Lock Heel Cup for extra comfort and shock absorption. 

 We also added metatarsal support to support the ball of your foot. This helps to distribute the force of constant impact across the entire foot 

Our patented, customizable biodynamic balance inserts keep your arches from collapsing in, correcting the angle at which your foot strikes the ground and providing a perfect fit for your unique gait.  Correcting this angle reduces or eliminates over-pronation. 

We have 3 different thicknesses so you can choose the one that’s right for you.  You simply select the one that provides the greatest comfort and relief. 

Superthotics instantly put your feet into alignment, relieving pain with every step. 

Superthotics provides the kind of custom support and alignment you used to only be able to get with these expensive prescription orthotics.

 

 

Foam, gel and other flexible or compressible materials commonly found in drugstore inserts are not able to provide proper support or put your feet and ankles into proper alignment.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Order your Superthotics in your normal shoe size. Below you can find our international sizing chart:

 

 

 

 



 

 

 

Dr. Briskin is a board-certified Doctor of Podiatric Medicine. He completed his residency at Flint General Hospital in Michigan and later established his own practice in Century City Hospital, where he served as Chief of Podiatric Surgery. In addition to co-founding the University Foot and Ankle Institute, Dr. Briskin also serves as an assistant clinical professor at the UCLA School of Medicine and is a Diplomat of the American Board of Podiatric Surgery and a Fellow of the American College of Foot and Ankle Surgeons.

 

Dr. Bob Baravarian is a board-certified Podiatric Foot and Ankle Specialist. Before co-founding the University Foot and Ankle Institute with Dr. Briskin, Dr. Baravarian spent four years at UCLA and prior to that completed a comprehensive three-year residency at the University of Pittsburgh with an emphasis on sports medicine, reconstructive surgery, foot and ankle trauma and diabetic limb salvage. Dr. Baravarian is also a Diplomat of the American Board of Podiatric Surgery and one of only a handful of foot and ankle surgeons to have both foot and reconstructive rearfoot and ankle certifications as a Fellow of the American College of Foot and Ankle Surgeons. He is currently a member of UCLA Medical Group, Chief of Podiatric Surgery at Santa Monica/UCLA Medical Center and Orthopedic Hospital, and an assistant clinical professor at the UCLA School of Medicine. Dr. Baravarian also serves as Editor Emeritus of the international medical journal, Foot and Ankle Specialist.
