story:
What is PTSD and MILSIM/Airsoft?

Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)  is a type of anxiety disorder. It can occur after you have gone through an extreme emotional trauma that involved the threat of injury or death.

Wikipedia defines them as: Airsoft is a sport in which individuals attempt to participate in the simulation of military combat also called MilSim or law enforcement-style combat; and MilSim is an abbreviation of Military Simulation, and refers to military simulations conducted by civilians for entertainment purposes.

Over the past couple of years an added benefit has surfaced from participating in this sport.  Military and law enforcement veterans have come forward with stories about how the MILSIM experience is helping with their PTSD symptoms.  I have been through the PTSD gauntlet myself, with my wife and with my brother - it's intermittent at best, therapists have no foundation to understand what veterans are talking about and the first course of therapy is drugs.  Right now there is little research being done on alternative coping mechanisms - this project will fund that research, increase awareness in a broader audience and hopefully help people understand what is going on within themselves and with others.

This may sound counter intuitive - that combat simulation helps combat veterans - but it works.  Ask any veteran what they miss most about their service and they will tell you it's the camaraderie.  This sport provides an outlet for their skills, energy and feelings in a familiar controlled environment.  MILSIM provides a similar bonding process and bridges the gap between civilian and military experiences.  This process creates a supportive and understanding network. 

This is not your typical airsoft competition; Operation Blacksheep is the marathon of the sport.  Operation Blacksheep is a squad based, 18+, 24 hour, force on force, objective oriented, continuous tactical simulation.

In the military we use the teminology - CRAWL, WALK, RUN.  We have observed the positve effects achieved through this experience by those who suffer from PTSD and have the testimonials from military and law enforcement veterans - CRAWL.  Your contributions will allow us to move into the WALK and RUN stages of researching, documenting and validating the benefits of the MILSIM experience.

Just One of Many Testimonials:

I first started playing Airsoft as something for my son and I to do together. The more and more I played it, the more and more I found it to be very therapeutic. I have gone from the simple spring guns to my favorite WE Tech M4 GBB. I changed to the GBB because it was as close to the real feel as I could get. I converted some of my friends from paintball to Airsoft and they love it. Some of them are veterans too and have also said how much it helps.

Don't get me wrong, I still have issues just like all us of do. This has allowed me to calm that inner calling I still have every day. Two weeks ago would have marked my 20 years. Unfortunately, a shattered ankle ended my career after only four years. It would be a great idea for the VA to sponsor something like this for all of us. I haven't found a form of therapy out there that works as good as this. Even friends of mine who have not served say that I have become a better person since playing and that's been three years now.

Keep up the great work. Hopefully we can get more people into this wonderful sport and expand it. I wish you the best of luck.

Short Summary

My wife and I are both retired US Army and PTSD has affected both of us and our
family. There is no greater calling than serving your country. The selfless service to others. The comaraderie. The mission. The responsibility for people's lives and millions of dollars worth of equipment. The recognition and respect while in uniform everywhere you go. The deep sense of purpose in what you are doing. Being at the top of your game!

The military is fairly isolated in our society, with less than 1% of our population serving in military uniform. They - your employer, your family, your friends - don't understand what you did and don't know how or if they should ask you about it. They may even be hesitant to be around you. You are told to minimize your military experience on your resume. Employers can't translate your leadership, tactical and operational experience, skills and knowledge into something they can use. That sense of purpose is lost. "The Hurt Locker" is one of the best portrayals of this inner dilemma.

MILSIM (military simulation) to the rescue! It's not the combat simulation specifically and some may not be ready for that exposure yet - no one wants to relive combat. MILSIM offers the opportunity to put the uniform back on. To teach and lead a team. To share your experience, knowledge and skills with an eager audience. To push yourself and your team to their limits. To feel the camaraderie, teamwork and excitement of mission success. To regain that respect and honor on the field. To have an outlet for your feelings. To have a purpose. Through your efforts in this sport, civilians gain a deep respect for what you have done and understand how difficult it is to be in the military - if only for a moment they can walk in your boots.

I have been involved in this sport for 10 years and producing national level events for 6 years.  My goal from the very beginning was to give civilians a taste of combat so they could understand what military folks go through on deployment, the challenges of leading a team through a tactical scenario and the skills required to do it properly.   Operation Blacksheep is designed to challenge you on every level – mentally, physically, tactically and spiritually – in as real a combat environment that we can safely produce. Operation Blacksheep is a squad based, 24 hour, 18+, force on force, objective oriented, continuous tactical simulation – it is the marathon of the sport.  The life changing stories told by civilians have confirmed that Blacksheep has achieved this goal.

When I talk to the military, they rarely know MILSIM exists or the benefits it provides.  I use four key terms when talking to the military about our sport – Recruiting, Retention, MWR support and PTSD.  This is a WIN/WIN situation.  More veterans will become aware of the sport and those who need it will get some relief.  The competition will soar as more military and law enforcement veterans are involved in teaching, coaching and mentoring players on tactics, honor, sportsmanship and safety.  The medical community will have a foundation on which to base more effective treatments and understand what veterans are talking about.  We are partnering with the medical community to help research, document and validate the positive effects we are seeing.  Blacksheep will offer a PTSD Therapist Immersion Training Program so they can gain a glimmer of understanding on what veterans have experienced.

I have found no other sport that provides a level playing field regardless of age, gender or physical ability.  It provides participants with physical activity, mental challenges, teamwork, leadership, communication skills, time management and more.  For our younger audience, they are learning valuable life skills and exercising more than their thumbs.

1% served 99% - now is your opportunity to put words into action with the 99% serving the 1% who volunteered.  Your contribution will allow us to raise PTSD awareness, bring this experience to a larger audience and help many veterans ease the pain.  I thank you in advance!

Use of Proceeds

Your contribution will allow us to bring this experience to a larger/broader audience and help many veterans ease the pain.  This campaign will be used in the following manner:

1.  $100,000 - PTSD awareness program development, assistance with alternative methods of therapy, on-staff medical professionals, and research, documentation, and validation of the PTSD benefits. 

Implementation of an immersion training program for PTSD therapists to provide a basic foundation of experience in understanding what veterans are talking about. 

Establishment of a separate not-for-profit/non-profit PTSD-MILSIM Challenge organization.  In the future this organization will: raise resources and funds through supporting partners, corporate sponsors and donors to provide support and assistance to those who suffer from PTSD and their families; foster and cultivate a strong peer to peer support base; provide grants and scholarships to individuals in need of additional care or counseling but can not afford it; and provide contributions to organizations who provide assistance and treatment for those with PTSD.

2.  $50,000 - Television/video development - a television/video series to portray the life of a soldier as experienced through MILSIM and document the positive effects on those who have PTSD.

3.  $100,000 - Event production equipment - equipment and supplies to provide the experience that provides the benefit nationwide.

Remember Everyone Deployed.

Less than 1% of our population serves in the military.

Wearing red every Friday is a way for the 99% to show the 1% they support them. Wearing red is requested every Friday and supported by many veterans organizations as well as those who wish to show support and understanding to every military member.

The red border around the Blacksheep Patch symbolizes that RED, Remember Everyone Deployed. Wear it proudly to demonstrate your support and understanding of every military member and especially those who face their personal battles with PTSD every day .

RED is a grassroots movement throughout the United States and even into some Allied countries. Support RED, Support PTSD, Support the Military and Blacksheep MILSIM, wear your RED patch with pride.

There is much symbology built into MILSIM already - when you pull out your RED dead rag - reflect for a moment on what you are doing and why.  The military folks you are emulating  - with the gear, Airsoft replicas, tactics and attitude - don't get a second chance.  Remember Everyone Deployed.

What We Need & What You Get

We are at the CRAWL phase of this work.  The PTSD-MILSIM Challenge will allow us to quickly move to the WALK and RUN phases with a solid team and the resources to make a change immediately.  The veteran statistics on suicides is unacceptable – 22 a day!  The majority of these veterans are under 30 years of age – prime candidates to participate in this sport.

Your contribution will allow us to bring this experience to a larger audience with the equipment and staffing to provide nationwide events.  MILSIM is a worldwide emerging sport.  Safety is the number one rule at Blacksheep in producing realistic tactical simulations.  We employ veterans.

The Impact

Very rarely does an opportunity present itself where you can change lives.  The Blacksheep PTSD-MILSIM Challenge provides that opportunity. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I know times are tough and every dollar counts.  Please consider your contribution carefully.  If you can't make a financial contribution, please help us spread the word by telling your friends. 

If you ever plan to attend a Blacksheep event, then buy your ticket now and get the RED patch to support this campaign - you can use the ticket anywhere, anytime.  If you don't want your free passes to an event - give them as a gift to veteran, donate them to a local team or donate them to the Blacksheep "Bring a Buddy" pass pool and wear the RED patch with pride.

Please read the attached files in the gallery - PTSD & MILSIM Thesis by J.M. Fluckiger and the Stars & Stripes Article on Veteran Suicides.  Also, check out the Self-Help for PTSD - this sport fulfills all of the recommendations.

Overcome your fear of the unknown, acknowledge the invisible wound and help us knock the stigma associated with PTSD into the dirt.  Help us blow our goal through the roof - the more we raise, the more we can do!

John Bucciarelli, Major, Infantry, US Army Retired

President, Blacksheep MILSIM
story_txt: What is PTSD and MILSIM/Airsoft?Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)  is a type of anxiety disorder. It can occur after you have gone through an extreme emotional trauma that involved the threat of injury or death.Wikipedia defines them as: Airsoft is a sport in which individuals attempt to participate in the simulation of military combat also called MilSim or law enforcement-style combat; and MilSim is an abbreviation of Military Simulation, and refers to military simulations conducted by civilians for entertainment purposes.Over the past couple of years an added benefit has surfaced from participating in this sport.  Military and law enforcement veterans have come forward with stories about how the MILSIM experience is helping with their PTSD symptoms.  I have been through the PTSD gauntlet myself, with my wife and with my brother - it's intermittent at best, therapists have no foundation to understand what veterans are talking about and the first course of therapy is drugs.  Right now there is little research being done on alternative coping mechanisms - this project will fund that research, increase awareness in a broader audience and hopefully help people understand what is going on within themselves and with others. This may sound counter intuitive - that combat simulation helps combat veterans - but it works.  Ask any veteran what they miss most about their service and they will tell you it's the camaraderie.  This sport provides an outlet for their skills, energy and feelings in a familiar controlled environment.  MILSIM provides a similar bonding process and bridges the gap between civilian and military experiences.  This process creates a supportive and understanding network.  This is not your typical airsoft competition; Operation Blacksheep is the marathon of the sport.  Operation Blacksheep is a squad based, 18+, 24 hour, force on force, objective oriented, continuous tactical simulation. In the military we use the teminology - CRAWL, WALK, RUN.  We have observed the positve effects achieved through this experience by those who suffer from PTSD and have the testimonials from military and law enforcement veterans - CRAWL.  Your contributions will allow us to move into the WALK and RUN stages of researching, documenting and validating the benefits of the MILSIM experience.Just One of Many Testimonials:I first started playing Airsoft as something for my son and I to do together. The more and more I played it, the more and more I found it to be very therapeutic. I have gone from the simple spring guns to my favorite WE Tech M4 GBB. I changed to the GBB because it was as close to the real feel as I could get. I converted some of my friends from paintball to Airsoft and they love it. Some of them are veterans too and have also said how much it helps. Don't get me wrong, I still have issues just like all us of do. This has allowed me to calm that inner calling I still have every day. Two weeks ago would have marked my 20 years. Unfortunately, a shattered ankle ended my career after only four years. It would be a great idea for the VA to sponsor something like this for all of us. I haven't found a form of therapy out there that works as good as this. Even friends of mine who have not served say that I have become a better person since playing and that's been three years now. Keep up the great work. Hopefully we can get more people into this wonderful sport and expand it. I wish you the best of luck. Short SummaryMy wife and I are both retired US Army and PTSD has affected both of us and ourfamily. There is no greater calling than serving your country. The selfless service to others. The comaraderie. The mission. The responsibility for people's lives and millions of dollars worth of equipment. The recognition and respect while in uniform everywhere you go. The deep sense of purpose in what you are doing. Being at the top of your game!The military is fairly isolated in our society, with less than 1% of our population serving in military uniform. They - your employer, your family, your friends - don't understand what you did and don't know how or if they should ask you about it. They may even be hesitant to be around you. You are told to minimize your military experience on your resume. Employers can't translate your leadership, tactical and operational experience, skills and knowledge into something they can use. That sense of purpose is lost. "The Hurt Locker" is one of the best portrayals of this inner dilemma.MILSIM (military simulation) to the rescue! It's not the combat simulation specifically and some may not be ready for that exposure yet - no one wants to relive combat. MILSIM offers the opportunity to put the uniform back on. To teach and lead a team. To share your experience, knowledge and skills with an eager audience. To push yourself and your team to their limits. To feel the camaraderie, teamwork and excitement of mission success. To regain that respect and honor on the field. To have an outlet for your feelings. To have a purpose. Through your efforts in this sport, civilians gain a deep respect for what you have done and understand how difficult it is to be in the military - if only for a moment they can walk in your boots.I have been involved in this sport for 10 years and producing national level events for 6 years.  My goal from the very beginning was to give civilians a taste of combat so they could understand what military folks go through on deployment, the challenges of leading a team through a tactical scenario and the skills required to do it properly.   Operation Blacksheep is designed to challenge you on every level – mentally, physically, tactically and spiritually – in as real a combat environment that we can safely produce. Operation Blacksheep is a squad based, 24 hour, 18+, force on force, objective oriented, continuous tactical simulation – it is the marathon of the sport.  The life changing stories told by civilians have confirmed that Blacksheep has achieved this goal.When I talk to the military, they rarely know MILSIM exists or the benefits it provides.  I use four key terms when talking to the military about our sport – Recruiting, Retention, MWR support and PTSD.  This is a WIN/WIN situation.  More veterans will become aware of the sport and those who need it will get some relief.  The competition will soar as more military and law enforcement veterans are involved in teaching, coaching and mentoring players on tactics, honor, sportsmanship and safety.  The medical community will have a foundation on which to base more effective treatments and understand what veterans are talking about.  We are partnering with the medical community to help research, document and validate the positive effects we are seeing.  Blacksheep will offer a PTSD Therapist Immersion Training Program so they can gain a glimmer of understanding on what veterans have experienced.I have found no other sport that provides a level playing field regardless of age, gender or physical ability.  It provides participants with physical activity, mental challenges, teamwork, leadership, communication skills, time management and more.  For our younger audience, they are learning valuable life skills and exercising more than their thumbs.1% served 99% - now is your opportunity to put words into action with the 99% serving the 1% who volunteered.  Your contribution will allow us to raise PTSD awareness, bring this experience to a larger audience and help many veterans ease the pain.  I thank you in advance!Use of ProceedsYour contribution will allow us to bring this experience to a larger/broader audience and help many veterans ease the pain.  This campaign will be used in the following manner:1.  $100,000 - PTSD awareness program development, assistance with alternative methods of therapy, on-staff medical professionals, and research, documentation, and validation of the PTSD benefits.  Implementation of an immersion training program for PTSD therapists to provide a basic foundation of experience in understanding what veterans are talking about.  Establishment of a separate not-for-profit/non-profit PTSD-MILSIM Challenge organization.  In the future this organization will: raise resources and funds through supporting partners, corporate sponsors and donors to provide support and assistance to those who suffer from PTSD and their families; foster and cultivate a strong peer to peer support base; provide grants and scholarships to individuals in need of additional care or counseling but can not afford it; and provide contributions to organizations who provide assistance and treatment for those with PTSD.2.  $50,000 - Television/video development - a television/video series to portray the life of a soldier as experienced through MILSIM and document the positive effects on those who have PTSD.3.  $100,000 - Event production equipment - equipment and supplies to provide the experience that provides the benefit nationwide.Remember Everyone Deployed. Less than 1% of our population serves in the military.Wearing red every Friday is a way for the 99% to show the 1% they support them. Wearing red is requested every Friday and supported by many veterans organizations as well as those who wish to show support and understanding to every military member. The red border around the Blacksheep Patch symbolizes that RED, Remember Everyone Deployed. Wear it proudly to demonstrate your support and understanding of every military member and especially those who face their personal battles with PTSD every day . RED is a grassroots movement throughout the United States and even into some Allied countries. Support RED, Support PTSD, Support the Military and Blacksheep MILSIM, wear your RED patch with pride. There is much symbology built into MILSIM already - when you pull out your RED dead rag - reflect for a moment on what you are doing and why.  The military folks you are emulating  - with the gear, Airsoft replicas, tactics and attitude - don't get a second chance.  Remember Everyone Deployed.What We Need & What You GetWe are at the CRAWL phase of this work.  The PTSD-MILSIM Challenge will allow us to quickly move to the WALK and RUN phases with a solid team and the resources to make a change immediately.  The veteran statistics on suicides is unacceptable – 22 a day!  The majority of these veterans are under 30 years of age – prime candidates to participate in this sport.Your contribution will allow us to bring this experience to a larger audience with the equipment and staffing to provide nationwide events.  MILSIM is a worldwide emerging sport.  Safety is the number one rule at Blacksheep in producing realistic tactical simulations.  We employ veterans.The ImpactVery rarely does an opportunity present itself where you can change lives.  The Blacksheep PTSD-MILSIM Challenge provides that opportunity.  Other Ways You Can HelpI know times are tough and every dollar counts.  Please consider your contribution carefully.  If you can't make a financial contribution, please help us spread the word by telling your friends.  If you ever plan to attend a Blacksheep event, then buy your ticket now and get the RED patch to support this campaign - you can use the ticket anywhere, anytime.  If you don't want your free passes to an event - give them as a gift to veteran, donate them to a local team or donate them to the Blacksheep "Bring a Buddy" pass pool and wear the RED patch with pride.Please read the attached files in the gallery - PTSD & MILSIM Thesis by J.M. Fluckiger and the Stars & Stripes Article on Veteran Suicides.  Also, check out the Self-Help for PTSD - this sport fulfills all of the recommendations.Overcome your fear of the unknown, acknowledge the invisible wound and help us knock the stigma associated with PTSD into the dirt.  Help us blow our goal through the roof - the more we raise, the more we can do!John Bucciarelli, Major, Infantry, US Army RetiredPresident, Blacksheep MILSIM

story:
OUR BEGINNING:

I have always loved kids. In High School, which only seemed like yesterday, I was associated with many children’s charities and organizations. Since then, I would do whatever it took to make sick children smile. Whether it be going to Macy’s and negotiating a deal for a hundred Max stuffed animals (Dog in Disney Little Mermaid), to dressing up in a panda bear costume or (see picture below),

bringing gifts to the kids at Shriner’s Hospital. In addition, I also coordinated magic shows and toy drives for children in the hospital as well. Seeing their faces light up was like gold for me. My dream was if I had super powers … I would take away all the pain and sickness, keeping all children happy and out of hospitals and in the safe arms of their moms and dads. After graduation, I entered into the jewelry industry, learning the fundamentals and then finally becoming a jeweler. However, I didn’t feel complete, my passion is working with kids. Therefore, I decided to put my jewelry career on hold while I try to pursue my passion of working with children, making an impact / impression. That’s when I decided to start Juzt 4 Kidz.

MY VISION

I wanted to create animal’s pillows that were cute, cuddly, and something different to attract our children’s attention but also make it practical for mothers and fathers. After researching for over a year, I have not seen a pillow that encompasses a 3-D character on a pillow and a blanket that is fully detachable with a removable cover to wash. After I confirmed that there was a void and niche opportunity in the child’s plush marketplace, so I started to doddle and came up with what I had first envisioned. The cow has always been a past time favorite to mothers and kids! I wanted to add in Mr. Bee, his outdoor buddy!

Our frog pillow really needed to have a bubbly character with big bright eyes along with complimentary lily pads which would intrigue young kids. We all remember The Muppets and the iconic image of a frog.

OUR MISSION

I created something soothing and friendly that had a bit of the good old days but included today’s technology. Something a child could relate to and carry it around like we all did, a favorite toy or a security blanket. Thus came the creation of Lullaby Light Up Pillows. It’s too easy for kids to pick up an IPad or an IPhone and play with it. However, for our little one’s it’s better to let them use what comes natural to them… their imagination and creativity. With our patent pending technology, we have spared no expense in using the plushest material that are made from 100% polyester. We use the best quality speaker size for the sound and soothing array of LED lights that display iridescence rays of multicolor light. We have followed the strictest U.S. guidelines for child safety including prevention of battery leakage, multicolor LED lights that do not overheat and no small parts.

THE PRODUCT

Our Lullaby Light Up Pillows encases 12 LED light bulbs stationed on a satin sheet inside the cushion. The LED light bulbs have a useful life of up to 50,000 hours. The benefits of LEDs are they use much less electricity than other bulbs, have extremely long useful lives, produce very little heat, do not emit UV or infrared, contain no mercury and are resistant to shock and vibration. The filling we use is a PVC like material tested and approved by U.S. standards. Located inside the cushion is the IC chip which took my team and I numerous months to put together in a working function (See Pic Below). 

Watch our video, with just a simple push of a button, it turns it on and off. It has an automatic cut off switch after approximately 17 minutes.



We also made it where you can fast forward to the next song by pushing two clicks of the button. We have tested many speakers for the module. There was one that was smaller and cheaper with a better fit for our pillow, however the quality was not up to Juzt 4 Kidz standards. I wanted crisp and clean sound so I opted to use a slightly larger speaker, nothing bulky where it would interfere with kids laying on it. All our cushions are then sewn shut completely where a child can’t gain access to the inside. There is a separate compartment that holds the battery box. Lullaby Light Up Pillows uses 3AA batteries and has a cover with a screw to secure the batteries in place. 

Finally, what you see in our pictures and videos are real working prototypes!



OUR BUSINESS

In October 2013 Juzt 4 Kidz made their debut at the ABC Kids Expo in Las Vegas.



We had a fantastic time and networked with a lot of companies locally and globally. We met and talked with so many people who loved our Lullaby Light Up Pillows and thought we had a great product, but with our limited resources, we couldn't make the number of Lullaby Light Up Pillows that larger retailers would want to work with.


Through hard work and dedication, we have managed to stock selected boutiques and children shops along the West Coast.

WHAT WE NEED

By attending ABC Kids Expo in Las Vegas this past October, we’ve opened the door to a flood of inquiries from big box store buyers, independent retail buyers and to retail rep groups wanting to rep our line. We need your help. We have done our diligence in screening our manufacturers and who they have worked with. We WILL NOT tolerate child labor issues or low-quality work. Our current manufacturer works with Disney in Japan and Bed Bath Beyond here in the USA. We have factory team members who will quality check our merchandise, making sure they pass not only domestic standards but our own higher standards as well. Because we have chosen to use a reputable and reliable manufacturer, we must purchase their required minimum order quantities for each style & color. Through the Indiegogo campaign, we are hoping to gain your support in satisfying the minimum order quantity, and to have the added capital for marketing and sampling. We also plan on attending more trade shows as well. By supporting us with your pledge, not only will you get one of our Lullaby Light Up Pillows, but you have the chance to give others a donation in YOUR NAME to a hospital we currently support!

We are proud to say that Juzt 4 Kidz currently supports Miller Children’s Hospital in Long Beach,Ca, Lucile Packard Children’s Hospital in Palo Alto, Ca, and currently negotiating with the women abuse center in San Francisco, Ca. Each quarter we donate a portion of our pillows to kids there. We need to educate and lead by example to our young generation that giving back to the community and kids in need is a great thing! As long as Juzt 4 Kidz is in business, helping kids will always remain a cornerstone for us.

As soon as our project is funded, we will immediately go into production with our manufacturer. This process will take approximately 30-45 days upon receipt of our initial 75% deposit. Once our order is finished, the remaining payment balance of 25% needs to be paid. Once everything passes inspections, our order will be loaded onto a ship in a sealed container from Asia and will arrive approximately 4-5 weeks later pending weather and U.S. Customs. Our shipment will then be trucked over to our warehouse in San Francisco for our team to do the final assembling, packaging and shipping which should only take about a week. We estimate the last week of May 2014 as our ship out date for your rewards and donated pillows which will be by USPS (United States Postal Service). We will keep you updated once we get closer to May 2014.

We are hoping that with a successful Indiegogo campaign, we can fulfill our dream to get our Lullaby Light Up Pillows out to the retail and online markets. Sending samples to the different retail buyers across the country will be key in getting our product known!! We also will try to comfort and calm kids with our Lullaby Light Up Pillows while during their hospital stay. With your validation we will make our dream come true!

OUR DESIGNS WITHOUT BLANKETS

OUR DESIGNS WITH BLANKETS
Currently, we are working on sketches for other designs coming soon!

COMING SOON IN 2014 A MONKEY WITH A BLANKET!

OUR TEAM

Anthony De Maio and I have been friends for many years now, his background is in finance. He is a loving and devoted father of two. With his experience and devotion he is the right guy to head up my finance department.

I had met David Cohen about a year ago and introduced him to our idea. He immediately fell in love with it! With having him part of our company and his years of experience in the consumer goods industry I feel he will help and lead our company on a path towards the big box retailers!

Lullaby Light Up Pillows would not have come to life without the help of my dear friend Jennifer Grooney. She is a talented and dedicated designer and freelancer. She has always loved working with children and when I told her about my idea and vision for animal characters, she immediately was on the same page as me. Thus came the creation of our first Lullaby Light Up Pillow’s cow design.

Anthony De Maio:

Has extensive investment banking and private equity experience over the past 15 years dealing with merger and acquisition transactions primarily with companies in the Food & Beverage, Consumer, Retail and Restaurant industries focusing on the natural and organic categories.  Prior to joining Juzt 4 Kidz as CFO Anthony ran D.A. Davidson's Natural and Organic Industry team out of Southern California.  Prior to Davidson he was a Senior Vice President at Wells Fargo Bank within their Consumer and Retail team and associate at Swander Pace Capital, consumer focused private equity shop.  He started his career as an Investment Banking analyst at Credit Suisse First Boston.  A few representative assignments include Build-a-Bear, Sports Authority, Big 5 Sporting Goods, Toys 'R' Us, Urban Outfitters, CVS, J.C. Penney, Mothers Work, Best Buy, Wal-Mart and Dollar General. Anthony holds a B.S. in Business Management and Marketing from Cornell University.  

David Cohen:

Has over 35 years of experience in the consumer goods industry including housewares, baby products and apparel.He has spent more than 20 years in the garment industry as owner and president of two successful apparel trim companies.He began his career with Boyle Midway, a division of Fortune 500 company: American Home Products, where he was the youngest sales manager in the company’s history.He has been very successful in bringing many new consumer products to market during his career.

Jennifer Grooney

Works in the Hospitality industry. She also works part-time following her passion for designing and freelancing.

DESIGN PROFICIENCY

Free-hand sketch designs

Computer and hand illustration
Product design specialize in baby/kid industry
Creating mock-ups and presentations for packaging
Photo retouching
Working under pressure with deadlines

TECHNICAL SKILLS

Uses PC and Mac
Fluent in Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Painter, Words, Exel


OTHER WAYS TO JOIN US!

We have spent the last year doing our research with the safety of the module inside and the LED lights. We have made sure that the fabric we use is top quality and everything not only meets but exceeds all inspections.
We have also spent the last year establishing a market, building a website and researching the toy industry. Through personal communications, tables at craft fairs, attending street fairs and representing ourselves at one of the toy industry's major trade shows, ABC Kids Expo, we have done a lot of leg work to make our product viable.
Our biggest challenge is securing the initial order with our manufacturer and with the help from Indiegogo we will achieve our goal.

Share! If you believe in what we're doing and why we're doing it, help share the Lullaby Light Up Pillows. Please "like" this Indiegogo page, share this Indiegogo page, tweet about us, pin us, and email your friends and family. While you're at it, visit Juzt 4 Kidz. on Facebook and "Like" us there too, and follow us on Twitter @juzt4kidz.

 ABOUT OUR VIDEO

The video was written and directed by Gregory Sung, and edited by Dan Micho, designer of pillows by Jennifer Grooney and Gregory Sung. A HUGE thank you to Traci Woolsey-Ewell, Tiffany Woolsey –Ewell, Denise Gerandt, Keely Strong, Gail Strong,Kennedy De Maio, Rylee De Maio, Kristi De Maio, Anthony De Maio, David Cohen, and the entire Wong family.

WE DO SHIP INTERNATIONAL

Please add  $30 for international shipping for the first Lullaby Light Up Pillow.  For multiple orders, please add $10 per pillow + base of $30. Excludes duties & taxes.

Customs. Our shipment will then be trucked over to our warehouse in San 
Francisco for our team to do the final assembling, packaging and 
shipping which should only take about a week. We estimate the last week 
of May 2014 as our ship out date for your rewards and donated pillows 
which will be by USPS (United States Postal Service).  We will keep you 
updated once we get closer to May 2014. We
 are hoping that with a successful Indiegogo campaign, we can fulfill 
our dream to get our Lullaby Light Up Pillows out to the retail and 
online markets. Sending samples to the different retail buyers across 
the country will be key in getting our product known!!
We also will try to comfort and calm kids with our Lullaby Light Up Pillows while during their hospital stay. With your validation we will 
make our dream come true!  
OUR DESIGNS WITHOUT BLANKETSOUR DESIGNS WITH BLANKETSCurrently, we are working on sketches for other designs coming soon!COMING SOON IN 2014 A MONKEY WITH A BLANKET!OUR TEAMAnthony De Maio and I have
been friends for many years now, his background is in finance. He is a loving
and devoted father of two. With his experience and devotion he is the right guy
to head up my finance department. 
I had met David Cohen about
a year ago and introduced him to our idea. He immediately fell in love with it!
With having him part of our company and his years of experience in the consumer
goods industry I feel he will help and lead our company on a path towards the
big box retailers! 
Lullaby Light Up Pillows
would not have come to life without the help of my dear friend Jennifer
Grooney. She is a talented and dedicated designer and freelancer. She has
always loved working with children and when I told her about my idea and vision
for animal characters, she immediately was on the same page as me. Thus came
the creation of our first Lullaby Light Up Pillow’s cow design. 
Anthony De Maio:
Has extensive investment banking and private equity experience over the past 15 years dealing with merger
and acquisition transactions primarily with companies in the Food &
Beverage, Consumer, Retail and Restaurant industries focusing on the natural
and organic categories.  Prior to joining Juzt 4 Kidz as CFO Anthony ran
D.A. Davidson's Natural and Organic Industry team out of Southern California.
 Prior to Davidson he was a Senior Vice President at Wells Fargo Bank
within their Consumer and Retail team and associate at Swander Pace Capital,
consumer focused private equity shop.  He started his career as an
Investment Banking analyst at Credit Suisse First Boston.  A few
representative assignments include Build-a-Bear, Sports Authority, Big 5
Sporting Goods, Toys 'R' Us, Urban Outfitters, CVS, J.C. Penney, Mothers Work,
Best Buy, Wal-Mart and Dollar General. Anthony holds a B.S. in Business
Management and Marketing from Cornell University.  
David Cohen:
Has over 35 years of experience in the consumer goods industry
including housewares, baby products and apparel.He has spent more than 20 years in the
garment industry as owner and president of two successful apparel trim
companies.He began his career with
Boyle Midway, a division of Fortune 500 company: American Home Products, where
he was the youngest sales manager in the company’s history.He has been very successful in bringing many
new consumer products to market during his career.
Jennifer Grooney
Works in the Hospitality industry. She also works part-time
following her passion for designing and freelancing.
DESIGN PROFICIENCY
Free-hand sketch designs
Computer and hand illustration
Product design specialize in baby/kid industry
Creating mock-ups and presentations for packaging
Photo retouching
Working under pressure with deadlines
TECHNICAL SKILLSUses PC and Mac
Fluent in Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Painter, Words, ExelOTHER WAYS TO JOIN US!We have spent the last year doing our research
 with the safety of the module inside and the LED lights. We have made 
sure that the fabric we use is top quality and everything not only meets
 but exceeds all inspections. 
We have also spent the last year establishing a market, building a 
website and researching the toy industry. Through personal 
communications, tables at craft fairs, attending street fairs and 
representing ourselves at one of the toy industry's major trade shows, 
ABC Kids Expo, we have done a lot of leg work to make our product 
viable.
Our biggest challenge is securing the initial order with our 
manufacturer and with the help from Indiegogo we will achieve our 
goal. Share! If you believe in what 
we're doing and why we're doing it, help share the Lullaby Light Up 
Pillows. Please "like" this Indiegogo page, share this Indiegogo page, tweet about us, pin us, 
and email your friends and family. While you're at it, visit Juzt 4 
Kidz. on Facebook and "Like" us there too, and follow us on Twitter 
@juzt4kidz.
 ABOUT OUR VIDEO The video was written and directed
 by Gregory Sung, and edited by Dan Micho, designer of pillows by 
Jennifer Grooney and Gregory Sung. A HUGE thank you to Traci 
Woolsey-Ewell, Tiffany Woolsey –Ewell, Denise Gerandt, Keely Strong, 
Gail Strong,Kennedy De Maio, Rylee De Maio, Kristi De Maio, Anthony De 
Maio, David Cohen, and the entire Wong family. WE DO SHIP INTERNATIONALPlease add 
 $30 for international shipping for the first Lullaby Light Up Pillow.  For multiple orders,
 please add $10 per pillow + base of $30. Excludes duties & taxes.

story:
Short Summary

3 months ago Lara Neumann was admitted into hospital with trouble breathing.

2 weeks later she was diagnosed with Pleuropulmonary Blastoma, one of the rarest cancers in the world.

How rare?  One in every 200 million.

Now we always knew that Lara was one in a million but now its time to show her just how much we care.

What We Need & What You Get

The average cost of medication for Lara PER WEEK is over $700.00.  

  • No medical insurance can be given with her type of Cancer
  • She cannot work while undergoing chemotherapy as her body is too weak
  • Her incredible parents are taking time away from work to be with her 
  • Finances are depleting
Lara is fighting the biggest fight of her life.  Money should not be a concern, but Cancer is expensive.  If you know Lara and have some change in your pockets at the end of the day, anything would be appreciated.  If you don't know Lara but still want to contribute, kindness from strangers is warmly welcomed. 


NEW GOAL: $15,000

On Saturday May 17th, we held a baseball tournament for Lara.  45 participants, raising over $4,000!  Lara and her family were present and I think it's fair to say, FUN was had by all!!!!!! 

We are concluding the campaign on May 28th and would love to end this with a BANG! Let's wrap this all up and hit $15,000 online to make a total of $20,000 raised!  We can do it, I know we can!


The Impact

LIFE CHANGING.  LITERALLY. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can’t contribute, but want to help please do these few things:

  • Make some noise about this campaign!  Let everyone know that you think may connect with this.  Tell all your friends on facebook and share this page on all the various social media sites!
  • Play Ball!  On May 17th we are hosting a FUN Baseball Tournament in downtown Toronto.  All skill levels are welcomed (even if you have never played before) and a prize will be awarded to the person with the highest donation amount! It's all about fun and Love for Lara! 
  • If you are interested in joining us, please contact baseball4neumann@gmail.com. Let us know your skill level and we will send you a donation form.

story: Money raised will go towards providing clean drinking water, safe food, and the medication we dispense to those who are ill. It will also be used to buy items to increase hygiene and prevent disease such as tooth paste, tooth brushes, deodorant, toilet paper, and hand sanitizer. It will also be used to purchase equipment such as stethoscopes to better examine patients.
story_txt: Money raised will go towards providing clean drinking water, safe food, and the medication we dispense to those who are ill. It will also be used to buy items to increase hygiene and prevent disease such as tooth paste, tooth brushes, deodorant, toilet paper, and hand sanitizer. It will also be used to purchase equipment such as stethoscopes to better examine patients.

story:
Every great athlete has a story how they raise to their greatness and status. LeBron James, Lionel Messi, Mike Tyson – their stories have inspired others to believe in themselves, to pursue their dreams, to change their lives forever. And those, who want to become as good as their idols, need to step up the game. But how to do that?

To become a world known athlete, you need to have financial investments in yourself. But what would happen if it could be different? If a boy or girl next-door, who can`t afford expensive training camps, clothes and sneakers would be granted the chance to pursue their dream for better life? You`ll think: how that`s possible? The answer is quite simple – street workout, the sport movement that has made millions of lives better. Our street workout online competition platform will give that chance to every kid in a world!

Street workout is a unique type of sport because it is available to every citizen of the world, without any limitations or discrimination. It is based on exercises using one's own body weight and resistance of gravity, using the environment and infrastructure available:

- Push-ups

- Pull-ups

- Dips

- Sit-ups

- And much more ... the basic movements are simple, but the progression is unlimited.

The street workout movement is based on the idea that anyone can participate, improve their physical form and health, and develop themselves. To maintain motivation and a spirit of competition, World Street Workout and Calisthenics Federation (“the Federation”) has founded a tradition of international competitions. These competitions have gained an immense wave of popularity for the street workout movement. Currently the only issue arises when competitions favor those who can afford to pay their way to competitions – those who cannot cover the cost of participation and living are unable to participate, thus coming in conflict with the democratic ideals of street workout. To avert this issue, the Federation has decided to implement a tradition not present in any other type of modern sport in the world – a world championship and other international competitions on the internet.

Street workout is not just a sport, it is a lifestyle. It is the opportunity to meet like-minded people, to unite and do something incredible, to motivate each other. Street workout is a community. Street workout unites all races, genders, social strata. Our social Project will bring this great movement much further by giving everyone the opportunity to participate.


IT platform will be created, where people will be able to participate in real World Championship using their existing Facebook and YouTube profiles. The platform will be accessible via web and as an application on handheld devices. Thus everyone will have a chance to apply and compete on a global scale at no extra cost. Challenge motivates and inspires to develop oneself. Practicing sport reduces negative tension, increases overall health condition and helps staying focused towards one’s goal. Street workout facilitates teamwork and creates new friendships. These benefits will contribute towards increasing the quality of one’s life and development of a better civic society.


The total costs of the Project are 48000 EUR which consist of the following main positions:

1) Development of the IT solution, Project webpage and applications - 8500 EUR;

2) Development of the platform’s design - 1500 EUR;

3) Technical equipment needed for running the platform – 7000 EUR;

4) Platform’s administration and technical maintenance for the first year - 6000 EUR;

5) Development and international co-ordination of official competition regulations – 5000 EUR;

6) Constant work of 5 judges for the first year – 15000 EUR;

7) Promotion of the platform in social media – 5000 EUR.

Development of the platform is only the first of the Federation's projects aimed towards using internet for worldwide popularizing of the healthy lifestyle and raising the importance of exercising in people's lives. The Federation has other similar projects and ideas in mind – ways to use and improve the platform to be developed within this Project. Thus any funds raised for this Project above the required amount will be directed towards further development of the Project.



The Federation is a non-governmental, non-for profit organization. The Federation receives no income, apart from limited donations from the personal funds of its Management Board. There are no commercial sponsors or financial investors behind the Federation. None of the Federation’s employees receives salary – all of them are pure enthusiasts doing their work for free. The Federation unites people and organizations who love what they are doing and want to make the world better by their work. It is already a phenomenon of 21st century how the organization with no money available has managed to organize 3 international Street Workout World Championships in 2011, 2012 and 2013 and Street Workout World Cup 2013 series in 8 countries around the world thus motivating millions of youth to follow and join the Street Workout movement.

Our goal is to improve the world. Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we require your support. We believe that this is a great idea which will provide youth the world over, especially those limited financially, with the opportunity to compete internationally, to become stars and to change their lives for the better. This is why we invite you to support us.

To keep you interested we've made a package of unique perks you cannot buy for money anywhere else. Imagine your name on the Project’s supporters’ list, or yourself wearing a unique shirt designed by famous artist and available in few pieces only, having a copy of the First champion’s trophy from the competition made with your support, or even feeling the exciting and sparkling World Cup or World Championship atmosphere by yourself! Check the list of our perks available and there’s definitely one for you!


Even if you do not have a chance to contribute now for sure you know other people who would be willing to do so. Please share this campaign with at least 3 of your closest friends, family members, colleagues, schoolmates, fellow students, etc.

Please also visit the Federation's Facebook page and press ‘Like’ if you appreciate the good work we are doing.


Why have you set such a high funding goal?

It reflects the estimated costs of the Project. They are based on figures provided by the industry professionals (we requested for cost estimates), as well as based on our existing practice. The money raised will be used for the development of the Project and we will do it in a completely transparent way.

What if you fail to raise the specified amount?

We truly hope to raise the set amount as it will guarantee successful realization of the Project. Nevertheless we have chosen flexible funding option as every bit of support we’ll receive will help the Federation to move on with the Project. Even if we fail to reach our set target we’ll use the support we have obtained to start implementation of the Project.

What if you raise more than the specified amount?

In case of surplus the money will be used for further improvement of the Project. There are also charges applied by Indiegogo and Paypal so we will actually receive less than the raised amount. Apart from the intended Project the Federation does far more towards worldwide development and promotion of street workout as a social movement, lifestyle and sporting activity. Therefore the money will be used by the Federation to carry out its daily work – promoting healthy lifestyle, building new training places (accessible free of charge) worldwide, motivating and educating children and youth, etc.

Why most of the perks are in limited quantity?

We are not a shop and do not sell goods at a market price. Through our perks we offer emotions, memories and unique experience. These perks are exclusive and you cannot get them anywhere regardless of how much money you have.

Are the shipping costs included for the deliverable perks?

Yes, the shipping costs are already included. We will ship worldwide. Local import taxes may apply.

What do I get if I choose 1 of the 2 “Become part of the family!’ perks?

Apart from your name being listed within the Diamond supporters' section of the Platform you will be able to visit the Street Workout World Cup 2014 Super Final in Oslo, Norway or the Street Workout World Championship 2014 in Moscow, Russia as our special VIP guest! These are real (not online) face-to-face competitions where top athletes from the whole world meet to decide best of the best. There is no other event where you can see so many stars at one place! And not only see – what we offer is the chance to meet them and spend time with them as if you would be participant yourself (no worries- you will not have to compete against them). It is actually a fully covered travel package (except for plane tickets and visa costs) for a VIP guest, which includes accommodation, dining, variety of activities, VIP seats in the competition and much more. There are only 2 places for the World Championship and 2 for the World Cup Super Final available.

NOTE: to use the perk for visiting the World Championship we strongly recommend claiming it on or before 1 July 2014 to arrange visa to Russia and plane tickets on time!

What do I get if I choose 1 of the 4 “Once in a lifetime!’ perks?

In addition to all what is already included in the “Become part of the family!’ perk there will be a special award given in your name to your favorite athlete in the competition. It will be done on the main stage after the competition during the official ceremony of awarding winners. You will be able to hand it by yourself. The perk is available to private individuals or companies, but there is only 1 such opportunity in the World Championship and 1 in the World Cup Super Final.

NOTE: to use the perk for visiting the World Championship we strongly recommend claiming it on or before 1 July 2014 to arrange visa to Russia and plane tickets on time!

What if I have other questions?

In case you have further questions about this campaign, the Street Workout movement and the Federation feel free to email us at info@wswcf.org. For more general information about the Street Workout movement and the Federation you can visit the Federation's web page and Federation's Facebook page.

story:
What is the Wingbrush?

With the help of our new Wingbrush, easygoing interdental cleaning is guaranteed. The patented feeler easily docks on your interdental space, press the Wingbrush and you are done. Stop searching and start finding the interdental spaces!

You do not longer have to bend or injure yourself in front of the bathroom mirror while using floss. Use the Wingbrush while watching TV, checking your smartphone or quickly after every meal. Interdental cleaning made simple!

 

 

The use of interdental brushes is associated with lower risk for periodontitis, tooth loss, heart attacks and diabetes. 

We did a scientific study on 1000 interdental spaces. The results were clear. With the Wingbrush test persons could reach significantly more interdental spaces than with a conventional interdental brush. On top, the test persons preferred the Wingbrush. It's so easy, that you start cleaning your interdental spaces regularly.   

 

Where can I use the Wingbrush?

 

Why is the Wingbrush better than floss, sticks and oral irrigators?

Above, we explained the importance of interdental cleaning. But do you clean them every day? You probably don't. All available devices have weaknesses: 

 

Change the size, not the system:

We are starting with 3 replaceable brush sizes. It is necessary to offer more than one size, because every mouth is unique and needs individual prophylaxis.

ISO 0 (small): Fits in every gap, especially for small interdental spaces, patients with brackets or retainers.

ISO 2 (medium): For wider gaps or teeth with crowns, bridges or implants.

ISO 3 (large): Conically shaped bristles, serves a wide range with a small wire. Perfect size for patients with periodontitis or wide gaps.

 

 As seen on:

 

We need wings to make our campaign fly. Hit one of the buttons below and show the Wingbrush to your friends.

 

 

 Our Story: 

During Louis' study of dental medicine, he recognized dentists usually act when it is too late. Dentists repair teeth or extract them because of caries or periodontitis.
 
Nobody is born with bad teeth. Daily oral care routine is the key for healthy teeth and healthy gum. Interdental cleaning is a important part of this. So, the main question we tried to solve was: How is it possible that everyone is aware of the importance of interdental cleaning, but nobody is doing it? We found the reason in the devices available for interdental cleaning. They either have a bad handling or a bad cleaning power. 

In 2012, our dentist Louis quickly got the idea to combine the feeler, known of his oral irrigator, with his interdental brush. After first tests with lots of superglue all over our teeth, we knew that it could work. Market research of Burak and Marc showed, that nothing similar is available in the market. 

After convincing M+C Schiffer GmbH, the biggest manufacturer of oral care devices in Europe, of our patented idea, we started making the Wingbrush reality. With each prototype, interdental cleaning became more simple and pleasant. A scientific study of the University of Bonn with almost 1000 interdental spaces showed a great advantage in handling and reachability of interdental spaces. 

The results motivated us to found our company called LUORO. The vision is to simplify oral care with innovative products. The Wingbrush is our first product.

We are ready to start, please support us to establish the Wingbrush in every bathroom. 

Below you find just some sources highlighting the problem with flossing and the importance of interdental cleaning:

  • Medical benefits of dental floss unproven
  • The effectiveness of interdental brushes
  • Why should I use interdental brushes?
  • Is flossing your teeth a waste of time?

A little bit more scientific evidence for all dental nerds out there:

  • Evidence suggests that interdental cleaning with interdental brush is the most effective method for interdental plaque removal.
  • No studies reported the effectiveness of flossing plus toothbrushing for preventing dental caries.
  • Use of floss/interdental brushes is associated with lower risk for new cardiovascular events.

 

 

Our timeline:

We reduced the risks to a minimum. Four years of development turned an idea into a product. Our study with the university of Bonn confirmed that all requirements are fulfilled. 

We are cooperating with a major producer of oral care products in Europe, the M+C Schiffer GmbH. Our product is patented and all development steps were made in cooperation with M+C Schiffer, so we can guarantee a high quality oral care product. 

M+C Schiffer is ready to produce, we need your support to press the button and start the production! 

There is always a little risk that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date or something else. We promise to communicate honestly and work around the clock to solve any upcoming problems.
story_txt:
What is the Wingbrush?With the help of our new Wingbrush, easygoing interdental cleaning is guaranteed. The patented feeler easily docks on your interdental space, press the Wingbrush and you are done. Stop searching and start finding the interdental spaces!You do not longer have to bend or injure yourself in front of the bathroom mirror while using floss. Use the Wingbrush while watching TV, checking your smartphone or quickly after every meal. Interdental cleaning made simple!  The use of interdental brushes is associated with lower risk for periodontitis, tooth loss, heart attacks and diabetes. We did a scientific study on 1000 interdental spaces. The results were clear. With the Wingbrush test persons could reach significantly more interdental spaces than with a conventional interdental brush. On top, the test persons preferred the Wingbrush. It's so easy, that you start cleaning your interdental spaces regularly.    Where can I use the Wingbrush? Why is the Wingbrush better than floss, sticks and oral irrigators?Above, we explained the importance of interdental cleaning. But do you clean them every day? You probably don't. All available devices have weaknesses:  Change the size, not the system:We are starting with 3 replaceable brush sizes. It is necessary to offer more than one size, because every mouth is unique and needs individual prophylaxis.ISO 0 (small): Fits in every gap, especially for small interdental spaces, patients with brackets or retainers.ISO 2 (medium): For wider gaps or teeth with crowns, bridges or implants.ISO 3 (large): Conically shaped bristles, serves a wide range with a small wire. Perfect size for patients with periodontitis or wide gaps.  As seen on: We need wings to make our campaign fly. Hit one of the buttons below and show the Wingbrush to your friends.   Our Story: During Louis' study of dental medicine, he recognized dentists usually act when it is too late. Dentists repair teeth or extract them because of caries or periodontitis. Nobody is born with bad teeth. Daily oral care routine is the key for healthy teeth and healthy gum. Interdental cleaning is a important part of this. So, the main question we tried to solve was: How is it possible that everyone is aware of the importance of interdental cleaning, but nobody is doing it? We found the reason in the devices available for interdental cleaning. They either have a bad handling or a bad cleaning power. In 2012, our dentist Louis quickly got the idea to combine the feeler, known of his oral irrigator, with his interdental brush. After first tests with lots of superglue all over our teeth, we knew that it could work. Market research of Burak and Marc showed, that nothing similar is available in the market. After convincing M+C Schiffer GmbH, the biggest manufacturer of oral care devices in Europe, of our patented idea, we started making the Wingbrush reality. With each prototype, interdental cleaning became more simple and pleasant. A scientific study of the University of Bonn with almost 1000 interdental spaces showed a great advantage in handling and reachability of interdental spaces. The results motivated us to found our company called LUORO. The vision is to simplify oral care with innovative products. The Wingbrush is our first product.We are ready to start, please support us to establish the Wingbrush in every bathroom. Below you find just some sources highlighting the problem with flossing and the importance of interdental cleaning:
Medical benefits of dental floss unproven
The effectiveness of interdental brushes
Why should I use interdental brushes?
Is flossing your teeth a waste of time?
A little bit more scientific evidence for all dental nerds out there:
Evidence suggests that interdental cleaning with interdental brush is the most effective method for interdental plaque removal.
No studies reported the effectiveness of flossing plus toothbrushing for preventing dental caries.
Use of floss/interdental brushes is associated with lower risk for new cardiovascular events.
  Our timeline:We reduced the risks to a minimum. Four years of development turned an idea into a product. Our study with the university of Bonn confirmed that all requirements are fulfilled. We are cooperating with a major producer of oral care products in Europe, the M+C Schiffer GmbH. Our product is patented and all development steps were made in cooperation with M+C Schiffer, so we can guarantee a high quality oral care product. M+C Schiffer is ready to produce, we need your support to press the button and start the production! There is always a little risk that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing timeline, shipping date or something else. We promise to communicate honestly and work around the clock to solve any upcoming problems.

story:
Liberation Barbell is the answer to a huge problem with the fitness industry. The industry motivates fitness through body-hate. It tells us that our bodies are never enough-- or more commonly-- that we are too much.

We want to change that. Liberation Barbell will be a barbell-focused fitness center that emphasizes body positivity, empowerment, and strength over looks. It is founded on the idea that physical fitness should be accessible to any body regardless of age, ability, gender identity, sexuality, or size.

Most gyms focus on weight loss as the clearest sign of health and wellness. We call bullshit on that! Liberation Barbell will focus on concrete strength gains and community building. Together, we’ll create a positive community of fitness in an explicitly feminist environment. We will use barbells, kettlebells, and free weights as our tools to strengthen the mind and connection to self. Let’s work out together-- not out of self-hate, but as a way to love and appreciate the current bodies we have.

Join me in creating a brand new body positive gym in Portland, Oregon.

 

 

I know firsthand the need for this kind of space. I’m a personal trainer. I’m a health coach. Every day, I work with clients of all body types who are new to fitness because it has never felt like a place for them. Clients who need a place like Liberation Barbell. Who demand it. Today, my waitlist is too full to accommodate everyone without a physical space to make it happen. Through my personal journey, I understand this need.

Growing up, I was an indoor-kid. I wasn’t into physical activity at all and was much more comfortable reading books in my room than breaking a sweat on the playing field. I felt awkward in my body and school gym classes were a complete nightmare that I made up every excuse possible to not have to participate in. When I eventually turned to fitness, I did so with a compulsive need to shrink myself. Coupled with an eating disorder, this was brutal. My journey to health has been about rebuilding my picture of wellness piece by piece.

Community became one of my biggest tools to get there. I founded my businesses Super Strength Health and the Rise and Resist Podcast on the belief that there is no wrong way to have a body. The friends I have made through this journey have helped me as much as I have sweat, lifted, and ate vegan snacks with them.

This community is important. It exists way beyond me and my clients. And it needs a home. Liberation Barbell would be the headquarters for bodies of all types and other body positive trainers like myself. It will be a home for the new and emerging narrative against the status quo of fitness.

This dream can be ours. But only if we start today.

Liberation Barbell will exist because of the growing demand for a body positive fitness space in Portland, OR. But building a gym is a big deal. This will only work if we summon the badass, grassroots support of our powerful bodies and dollars combined.

Your support will help cover these basic needs:

  • Equipment
  • Ability to secure a lease
  • Business insurance
  • Modest employee startup salaries
  • Startup marketing costs

Our Indiegogo goal is $25,000. To meet the total funding need-- about $100,000-- we’re turning to medium and large investors in our community.

This spacious facility will open in Inner East Portland. Expect lots of windows for that small smidge of sun Portland gives us nine months a year. Expect best-in-its-class Rogue equipment. It will be simple (no machines, only free weights) but will have everything you need to get super buff with all the nicest stuff.

In addition to open gym hours and classes, we will host olympic and powerlifting seminars and a multi-gendered, body positive powerlifting team. There will be clean, organized, equipment-and plenty of it.

When fundraising is complete, we’ll get to work with securing the space, starting the buildout, ordering the equipment, creating a marketing presence, and continuing getting the word out as fast as possible!

When you donate, you are directly supporting a space, equipment that helps us to put in the work and to make modifications easy for beginners, insurance, and for the hiring of body positive coaches and trainers.


In exchange for your donation, you will get perks the Liberation Barbell way. Get stoked for nutrition plans, lifting plans, the SuperTasty Anti Inflammatory cookbook, a drop-in class, snack boxes, a pre-paid membership, an AMAZING RIP Patriarchy T-shirt by artist Sarah Gottesdiener,  a lifetime membership, and major high fives. You will gain the satisfaction of knowing that you’re helping not just to build a space, but also to change the world.

 

 

Every day, I spend amazing time with clients of all body types helping them reach their fitness goals. Many people come to me because they’ve had negative experiences with other trainers. Because they feel unwelcome in every other space they’ve been to.

When we begin work together, they feel great. They are empowered. And they want more.

Liberation Barbell would have a threefold impact:

  • Meet the growing demand of a body positive fitness community. This community is growing. A physical space is crucial because there are so many people who want in. I currently have more people on my waiting list than I could possibly hope to see on a one-on-one basis. I want to help meet this demand by creating a home for body positive fitness in Portland.
  • Create the first space of its kind, size, and quality for all bodies. For many, the gym is not a safe or empowering space. Liberation Barbell would meet this need, bringing body positive trainers, classes, and gender neutral changing rooms and shower spaces to this city. Its equipment will be as high quality as its functional fitness philosophy. And it’s the first space run by me and my team; I have a proven track record of making body positive fitness thrive as a business.
  • Set a national example for a new kind of fitness. This movement stretches far beyond Portland. Through my community networks, I have met dozens of people who crave this kind of space in their town. The generous media coverage I have already received about my businesses tells me there is an international hunger for this kind of project. Liberation Barbell won’t just be a flash in a Pacific Northwestern city. It will ignite new possibilities for body positive fitness across the world.

Liberation Barbell will be a place to get buff! It’s also a jumping off point for a new kind of fitness. Fitness that is about building you up, not tearing you down. We demand a work-out space that celebrates our strengths and our weaknesses. We don't have to be perfect to deserve fitness.

If you live in Portland, get ready for a new space where you’ll feel safe and strong in a different kind of fitness community. If you don’t live in Portland, get ready to support a gym that will ignite a ripple effect across the world. (And come visit sometime!) Together, we can create a new fitness movement for all bodies regardless of size, ability, age or gender.

 

There are many hurdles to opening a physical space, but we know we are buff enough to jump ‘em.

The most pressing challenge is securing the real estate for this dream. Once we have successfully raised the funds to lease a space, the rest is easy.

Why so sure? We’ve got a great team. Together, we combine lifting experience, business savvy, and a deep love for our mission.

Let’s start with me: In addition to successfully running two businesses (Super Strength Health and Rise and Resist podcast), I have hustled for years and am damn good at it. I have successfully met crowdfunding goals before with our campaign for the Rise and Resist Podcast Patreon, built an overwhelming demand for health and wellness clientele, and created international community through speaking, blogging and leading workshops around my story.

And I’m not doing this alone. My business partner Christina Cabrales, is an expert in program and project management. She has worked in start-up environments, created and delivered multiple technical trainings, and has led teams to successfully crush their professional goals. Christina’s incredible organization and people skills are perfect to keep the Liberation Barbell client experience 150% awesome.

When building our business team, we knew we wanted to live the Liberation Barbell mission through who we recruited. We have carefully built an incredible team of entirely women and queer small business advisors, attorneys, designers, contractors, and accountants.

We acknowledge risk and challenge, and firmly believe we are the people for this job.

If you’ve ever been body shamed, felt insecure trying to start your fitness routine, or dealt with self-hating internal dialogue, I encourage you to donate. Every single dollar towards this gym supports body positive fitness internationally.

Liberation Barbell will light a fire in many hearts across the world. That goes beyond the physical space. It’s also about building a movement. Here are some ways you can help build the movement:

  • Share with your networks. Signal boost this campaign on your social media page with friends, family, and other superheroes like yourself.
  • Lend a hand. We’re on the hunt for real estate space in Inner East Portland, OR. If you know of a space or want to volunteer your time in the search, let us know.
  • Invest. If you're interested in greater support opportunities, contact us at lacyisripped@gmail.com.
