story:
Relieve Stress, Migraines, Headaches and Anxiety with a press of a button!


Headoc combines 3 technologies to address problems caused by modern lifestyle - in a simple and effective way.


Relieve problems that everyday people suffer from – almost every day.

Modern lifestyle leaves less and less time to relax, breathe and ease away the stress gathered through the day. Stress, Headaches and Migraines have become so common. In many cases, we tend to underestimate their effect on our life and even ignore it completely.

We feel stressed all the time. We want to meet expectations at work. We want to enjoy our free time to be with our family, meet our friends and visit our parents. We find ourselves working harder, for longer periods. We forget that the more stressful and anxious we are – the less productive we are. 

We find ourselves struggling to make the most out of our day, and forget that sometimes we need to pause and breathe.

Feeling good is important, and the Headoc is here to make sure you feel better.

 Anytime. Anywhere.


The technologies in the Headoc are all aimed to fight stress, anxiety and migraines. Three technologies working synergistically for optimal results in minimal time.

Behind the science - A short review of the technologies: 

Negative ions are a natural molecule found in nature which improves cognitive functions as well as affects mood and depression.

Negative ions can be found in the air around us at all times. When spread in to the air, negative ions reduce depression, improve memory and enhance cognitive performance. Negative Ions have a positive effect on decision making and concentration required by the fast pace of modern lifestyle.

Environments with high negative Ions have a positive effect on cognitive performance and mood. Waterfalls, the Alps, the ocean and many outdoor sceneries offer high concentration of negative Ions. That is why we feel even better on vacation. Now, the Headoc brings Negative Ions to the palm of your hand.
Read more about Negative Ions

Vibration has been proven to be a stress relieving technique which also improves blood flow. The Headoc utilizes the advantages of vibration therapy to assist with anxiety, pain and even improve sleep. The Headoc vibration is soothing and relaxing, and also aids the effect of the other technologies utilized in the Headoc.

The vibration’s intensity can be easily adjusted to suit a volume you feel comfortable with. The Headoc’s vibration mode also allows use of the Headoc as an applicator of creams or oils, providing a massage to the skin which helps the cream enter the skin and pores. The cream applicator is a standard part of the Headoc package, and can be used for beauty creams, massage oils, and other ointments meant for skin application.

Read more about Vibration Therapy

 

Red light photo-therapy is proven to increase metabolism of muscle and tissue. NASA has used photo-therapy as a main part of astronauts care in space. Red light photo-therapy is frequently used in beauty care. It is marketed in professional devices of cosmetic care and home use devices.

Red light treatments can improve skin regeneration, which provides better composure of the skin as well as help minor wrinkles. In the medical industry, red light photo therapy has many uses. Research has shown that red light is linked with energy & metabolism in muscle, bone and other tissue. Moreover, it has even been suggested that astronauts can use LED blankets to prevent muscle and bone atrophy (degeneration of cells).

 

Read more about Red Light Photo-Therapy




  The 3 technologies Headoc is using are not new technologies and are used in many applications separately. Each technology (Negative Ions, Red Light Photo-Therapy, and Vibration) is approved for use by the FDA, CE and others. The production used to make Headoc is according to ISO and GMP standards, and all materials used in Headoc are of medical grade. 

The Headoc is made from medical grade materials. The components inside were reviewed closely, and customized to provide optimal results. Each component is important to the effect the Headoc creates. Have a look at what's inside the Headoc:

The 3D model is interactive! Put your mouse over the Headoc and move it by yourself to see Headoc from all angles

 

The Headoc has an accessory (cosmetic cap) that makes the Headoc perfect for application and introduction of creams, oils and ointments on to the skin to improve tissue penetration and creams' absorbency in the skin.


We have the prototypes ready. We have submitted a patent for the Headoc. The technologies used in the Headoc are approved for use by FDA and EU. The Headoc’s concept is ready for the next level.

The funding we receive will be invested only into the Headoc’s production process and planning future development of the Headoc. The funds raised will be used for:

  • Finalizing the Headoc’s design.
  • Preparation for mass production.
  • Purchasing the raw materials and components.
  • Manufacturing tools and molds required for production.
  • Establishing the production process and testing it.
  • Production!


 

Headoc was made to solve everyday problems, for the everyday people

Our friends and family are those everyday people, and so are you. They came to us asking for a solution for their everyday problems – stress and headaches. After our success with the Eardoc (a device for ear infections and ear pain), they hoped we could help them get some relief for those issues as well.

We pride ourselves in over 20 years of innovation and success in the healthcare industry. Our CEO & founder has over 70 international patents registered to his name, used in products sold to many large companies and users around the world.

We devote ourselves to make people’s lives better. We offer various solutions for Healthcare, both for use in medical procedures as well as home care. Our products are sold worldwide to companies in the healthcare industry as well as end users. Amir doesn’t just invent new products, he invents products the world needs.

Common conditions, unique solutions
"Insanity is doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results" - Albert Einstein.
Solving everyday conditions for the common people requires a unique approach. We look at every problem and search for new solutions. We think how to create new solutions. We examine each problem as if it were our own problem, motivating ourselves to reach new & effective conclusions. We like to reach our goals, and we have what it takes – vast experience, advanced technologies and sky-high motivation!

 

AMIR PORAT / CEO, FOUNDER & INVENTOR

Over 20 years of experience and 70 patents prove Amir is here to make the world better

 

BARAK SHITRIT / HEAD OF DEVELOPMENT

Operations Master and Marketing ninja. Here to make the Headoc a reality.

 

AMIR LANDAU / PRODUCT SPECIALIST

Top of the line engineer, specializes in production and materials. Knows the Headoc inside out and top to bottom.

 

LIGAD GRANIT / PROFESSIONAL ADVISOR

Devoted professional advisor and a very happy person. Certified CCIL life coach, Stress-Busting Mentor and expert in depression and anxiety.

 

TAMAR TOBI / MEDICAL ADVISOR

A knowledgeable source of research and facts, innovation enthusiast and an interdisciplinary medical advisor

* And a Special thanks to Bhavesh Rajwani and Lee Mash, our two interns who did a great job at getting us closer to making the Headoc a reality!

This is the first time the three therapies have been optimized and developed to fit in one device. A device so small it could fit into your toiletries kit, so you’d never have to worry about worry again.

Thank you for reading all the way here. If you have any feedback we’d be happy to hear it! Please do not hesitate to contact us on Indiegogo, Website, Facebook, Twitter or any way you find convenient.

More importantly, if you know someone who could do with some de-stressing, migraine relief or just needs a mood boost, do them a favor and share this with them.

Doing a good deed will make your day a bit brighter, too! :)

Customer Service & Shipping:

  • Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my contribution?

    If you are in the U.S.A., shipping is included in your perk contribution. If you are outside of the U.S.A., please add $15 to your contribution for international shipping.

  • What if I forgot to add international shipping to my contribution?

    No problem! Use the "international shipping" perk to add the $15 for international shipping to your previous contribution.

  • Where do I put my address?

    You will be required to enter a shipping address when backing any of the product perks through Indiegogo. We will also be emailing all backers prior to shipping asking for updated mailing addresses. If your address changes before we ship your Headoc, feel free to email us at info@headoc.info. 

  • When will I get my Headoc?

    Shipping dates are estimated to be before or during July 2015.

* UPDATE: The shipping date has been updated to October, 2015. *

Product handling and operation:

  • What conditions does Headoc treat?

    Headoc combines three technologies, and each of them has its virtues. The Headoc’s main purpose is to relieve Headaches, migraines and stress. However, the technologies have vast effects, and are used in many products to treat other conditions. These include – fatigue, anxiety, short term mental distress, dizziness, cramped muscles. In addition, the Headoc has positive effects on memory, cognitive functions and skin regeneration.  

  • How does Headoc work?

    Headoc uses a combination of three technologies. Each of them works individually, and they can work simultaneously. The Headoc works on a chargeable battery that lasts for several hours of constant use. The Headoc is charged by USB cable, connected to a computer or USB Charger. 

  • How long should I use the Headoc?

    The Headoc can be used several times a day, for variable durations according to your needs. The effect of the Headoc will be felt within minutes. However, the recommended use is 5 minutes and up to 15 minutes for optimal results. The Headoc can be used for up to an hour. It is recommended to use the red light in intervals of 5-6 minutes.  

  • Are the Headoc’s technologies approved by health authorities?

    The 3 technologies are not new technologies and are used in many applications separately. Each technology (Negative Ions, Red Light Photo-Therapy, Vibration) is approved for use by FDA, CE and others. The materials used in Headoc are of medical grade. 

  • Is Headoc safe?

    Headoc is safe for use if instructions are followed.

  • Who can use Headoc?

    The Headoc can be used by anyone age 3 and up. 

  • How long will it take for Headoc to provide results? 

    It varies from person to person. Certain people will feel immediate impact and for others it may take several days to feel the full effect. For most people, the Headoc’s effect should be felt in minutes, with emphasis on quick relaxation.

  • How do I charge Headoc?

    Each Headoc is shipped with a standard USB charging cable and can be connected to a computer or an adapter for charging. It is recommended to charge the Headoc overnight when the battery is weak.

  • How long does the battery last?

    The Headoc can be used for several days without charging the battery, depending on the frequency of usage - how many times a day and how long. 

Headoc’s accessories:

  • Use of Headoc for cosmetic purposes  

    The Headoc can be used for application of creams, oils and ointments on the skin to improve tissue penetration and absorbance in the skin. The cosmetic cap is easy to use: 

    I. Place the transparent cap on the Headoc. 

    II. Apply the cream/lotion/ointment on the skin in the area you wish to cover.

    III. Start the vibration and red light (no need to turn the Negative Ions on) and start massaging the lotion in to the skin.

    IV. The lotion/ointment will be slowly absorbed into the skin.

    V. After use take of the transparent cap off the Headoc and clean it with a damp cloth or wet wipes. Store it in the box until the next use.

  • Use of Headoc for strong headaches  

    The Headoc is provided with a unique forehead cap which enhances the effect of Headoc. The forehead cap is used when you have a strong headache felt mainly in the forehead.  The forehead cap can also be used for relaxation of muscles or other parts of the body. Simply Insert the cap on the Headoc, start the vibration mode and apply on the forehead or intended area. 







For media contacts, please contact info@headoc.info. If you'd like some information on the Headoc and its technologies (including reference to relevant research) please visit our website: http://headoc.info

story:
My name is Monique. I am a beauty therapy lecturer living in Oxford with my husband Deon and two young boys, Alex and Liam. Although the UK has been our home for many years, we still have family in South Africa. Seven months ago my sister-in-law gave birth to a beautiful baby girl. Like her brother, she was born premature and had to spend the first 8 weeks of her life in ICU.

While in hospital the doctors repeatedly tried to do the routine hearing tests they do for all babies, but Nina's tiny little ear canals were too small. Finally, at seven months she was referred to a neurophysiologist to test her brainwave response to sound. Sadly, there was very little. She has extreme hearing impairment.

Looking at my own 8 week old son and thinking of what lies ahead for Nina breaks my heart. We all wish the best for our children, and we hope they will be successful in life. But for Nina going to a regular school and university will be a major achievement.

After her diagnosis Nina was given hearing aids to see if there was any improvement. Unfortunately she has shown no change in her behaviour. The last hope is to fit her with cochlear implants, and it has to happen before she is one year old.

As a beauty therapist I do not have the ability to send lots of money. But I can make lovely bath salts. And I hope that through this crowdfunding project I can help little Nina have a life with music, beautifull compliments, and wonderful opportunities.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The doctors have estimated the cost of Nina's cochlear implants to be £30,000. Her dad is fortunate enough to have basic medical insurance, but it does not come close to covering the costs of the implants and post-operative care in South Africa.  The whole family is very shocked by this news, and all of us are doing what we can to reach the amount. My dream is to phone my sister in law and bring her £1000 closer to this life-changing operation. I hope to achieve this by getting crowd funders excited about my special recipe bath salts!

I will send you a beautified recycled bottle filled with relaxing bath salts if you donate £20 or more towards this cause and live in the UK.

I will send you the recipe for this bath salts and a "for NINA bath salts" sticker to put on your own home made bath salts if you donate under £20 and live in the UK, or any amount and you live abroad.

If you are a shower person, and do not want any bath salts, feel free to donate anyway.

What will be more satisfying than having a tranquil soak in a bath tub, absorbing all the essential oils, knowing that you donated towards a little girl's future?

Here are two links showing the impact cochlear implants have on people's lives. The first has gone viral, and the second one gives more details on cost. Both are very emotional...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UyECCMdlVFo

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s9H_StoVsPU

Nina is 8 months old now. The sooner she gets her implants, the quicker brain stimulation will start and she can then learn to speak through therapy.

So please help me to spread the word (and bath salts).... Facebook your friends, email everybody and tell the neighbour next door!

Thank you so much!

And I hope that through this crowdfunding project I can help little Nina have a life with music, beautifull compliments, and wonderful opportunities. What We Need & What You GetThe doctors have estimated the cost of Nina's cochlear implants to be £30,000. Her dad is fortunate enough to have basic medical insurance, but it does not come close to covering the costs of the implants and post-operative care in South Africa.  The whole family is very shocked by this news, and all of us are doing what we can to reach the amount. My dream is to phone my sister in law and bring her £1000 closer to this life-changing operation. I hope to achieve this by getting crowd funders excited about my special recipe bath salts!I will send you a beautified recycled bottle filled with relaxing bath salts if you donate £20 or more towards this cause and live in the UK. I will send you the recipe for this bath salts and a "for NINA bath salts" sticker to put on your own home made bath salts if you donate under £20 and live in the UK, or any amount and you live abroad.If you are a shower person, and do not want any bath salts, feel free to donate anyway.What will be more satisfying than having a tranquil soak in a bath tub, absorbing all the essential oils, knowing that you donated towards a little girl's future? Here are two links showing the impact cochlear implants have on people's lives. The first has gone viral, and the second one gives more details on cost. Both are very emotional...https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UyECCMdlVFohttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s9H_StoVsPUNina is 8 months old now. The sooner she gets her implants, the quicker brain stimulation will start and she can then learn to speak through therapy. So please help me to spread the word (and bath salts).... Facebook your friends, email everybody and tell the neighbour next door!Thank you so much!

story:
Malnutrition and India

1 out of 3 malnourished children in the world lives in India.

In India, 47% children are underweight and 46% are too small for their age.

It also costs lives- more than 50% of all childhood deaths in India

Anaemia is a challenging problem and affects more than 90% of adolescent girls and 50% of women. From all strata’s of the society! 

We live in a country of 1.25 billion people. We are challenged in all aspects of life. Health and education being the major concerns. Malnutrition does not need to be located in our country, and is visible to the naked eye. The images of Africa that click in our minds the moment we hear malnutrition, are unfortunately similar to Indian standards. Malnutrition is more common in India than in Sub-Saharan Africa.

India tackles the problem of hunger via the mid-day meal program, low cost food product availability, as well as social sector awareness and a base of humanity in the Indian culture. Deaths due to hunger are minimized in our country, but yet does not resolve our question as to the incidence of malnutrition and Anaemia in such high ratios, in both the genders and all age groups!
The problem isn’t hunger; the problem is lack of appropriate nutrition.

Mumbai is the most densely populated cities in our country having more than 12.6 million people living and working in the city. It is exploding with more than 20 thousand people staying in one square kilometre of the island. 0 time for healthcare. Evidently, Mumbai faces the silent epidemic of malnutrition and the deadly disorders that come with it. 


The Solution?

Fortification! The essentials of Iron, Folic acid and Vit.B12 in recommended daily allowance provides the individual the bridge that he needs to complete his wear and tear for optimum functioning.
Including the vitamins, proteins, minerals and other micro nutrients that are important to cover the residual loops in our daily eating habits.

Innovation?

A course of 3 months of FSFA is required to reverse the conditions, and other multi vitamin supplementation is also given for completing the deficit. Children, teenagers, as a matter of fact even adults do not prefer taking pills for such a long duration, and there is lack of adherence and compliance to it. Hence, despite of corrective means being available, the condition is still persistent.
Our biscuits are easily available, tasty, and nutritious. They have a good shelf life and hence can be stored for a longer period as well. Not only do the individuals like consuming it, there is no risk involved with the consumption like medicines.  It can be served with all possible variants of food and become a passive part of the routine. They are low cost and result oriented for the consumer as well. They are minimal purpose flour containing, and guarantee the best results.

A minor scale consumption of 2 biscuits per day for 5 days a week is enough to show the desired changes in the condition of the consumer.
They are highly recommended in adolescent and pregnant females, growing children, TB and HIV patients, Anaemic and weak individuals.  It is a must for children and teenagers. 

What we shall provide?

We shall provide you with our low cost and sustainable program as per the conditions prevailing there. We shall arrange for a team of doctors to conduct the health evaluation in the region of your choice if needed.  All the results shall be transparently visible to you at all times. Scientific evidence based protocol is implemented in production, distribution and deliverance.

We are providing the opportunity to implement prophylactic measures, in a very consumer friendly approach, and enabling every individual to silence this fatal issue. Not just for yourself, but for the community. 

Deliverables

Demographics of child

Anthropometry

Height + Weight

General examination

Dental examination

Physiotherapy

Deworming

Vitamin A prophylaxis

Drug providing / Referral check

Electronic data entry

Hard copy record to school

Haemoglobin check*

Preventive Medicine seminars

-  Children specific

-  Personal Hygiene

-  Menstrual Hygiene

-  Importance of Breast feeding

-  Ante Natal + Post Natal care

-  Ergonomics

-  Food hygiene

-  Toilet hygiene

First Aid Workshop for teachers/Volunteers

Implement malnutrition and anaemia program.
3 months supply of fortified biscuits.

Providing all doctors and volunteers.

Electronic data sheet.

Make project sustainable

Provide Venue, travel, Basic essentials
in 350 INR / Child.

Advantages:

-  No product is available in the market with this combination.

-  Low cost, sustainable, quick results, traceable.

-  Does not require manufacturing space

-  Easy stored, transported

-  Nutritious, tasty and hence consumed easily. Increased adherence.

-  Minimal purpose flour mixture ‘Maida’ used for preparation.

-  No need to cook, ready to eat product.

story:
My Sister in law Andrea Shelly Weems has Multiple Sclerosis-This Is Her Story.

In the few short years since Shelly was diagnosed with MS - she has gone from dizzy spells and loss of balance - to being fully confined either in a wheelchair or a hospital bed. Shelly is living with constant pain and her limbs are no longer hers to move as they once did. Her ability to speak has been taken from her by this debilitating disease and though she is still the same person and we love her - Shelly is locked inside her own body. 

This is Shelly's Fundraiser to help with the cost of the "home help" that cares for Shelly on an Almost daily basis. We are trying to raise $10, 000 towards a years worth of care.  The care cost between $200-$300 every week. Even with family helping, and disability (Shelly who has worked all her life can no longer work) the help isn't enough to stay above water. Her husband Anthony, works 2 jobs and takes care of their 3 children.  

This is a burden- emotionally and financially- that can be lessened by your Gift. Your Gift will provide a care giver to help Shelly live as fully as possible and it will provide financial relief for a burden that isn't sustainable. 

If you can't donate please pray for Shelly & share. We appreciate any and all prayers, donations and Shares.  If we don't reach our goal of $10,000 - every penny that is collected goes directly to Shelly.

story:
A MIRACLE FOR MARLEY

My name is Emma Boyd. I am a freshman at the University of Texas at Austin, and for the past year I have been Marley Bedford's personal babysitter.

Marley is the most incredible little girl I have ever known. Here's why:

Basic speech, motor ability, or even life were supposed to be nonexistent in Marley. Her parents were told to put her on morphine and hospice, and that she would not live to see her first birthday. Marley has an extremely rare disease called Rhizomelic Chondrodysplasia Punctata (RCDP), and will celebrate her third birthday in December.

 

About RCDP

There are fewer than 100 children in the world at this moment with RCDP. It is a treacherous genetic disorder that causes painful bone and joint deformities, mental retardation, pulmonary complications, and other (as of yet undiscovered) issues. How RCDP has affected Marley:

  • Marley wears contacts daily because her lenses were surgically removed due to the cataracts she was born with.
  • At eleven months, she underwent major spinal surgery.
  • Marley spent her second birthday in the hospital due to hypoglycemia that has yet to be explained.
  • On July 11, she traveled to Baltimore to have hip reconstructive surgery on her right hip. She will return on August 22 for her left hip. 

 

The biggest hurdle in beating RCDP is awareness.

 

Research

It amazes me that in 2012 we still know so little about RCDP. Every disease has what is called a Natural History, which studies how a disease has affected patients in the past and tells the natural course the disease will take. RCDP has no natural history. This means that doctors only have a slight idea of how RCDP will affect a child. Children with RCDP are essentially given a death sentence with no definitive reasoning. 

Why do doctors know so little about RCDP? Because they lack the funding to even compile patients' information!

Researchers just discovered a medication that could potentially boost cognition and help RhizoKids on a molecular level. But to further research and get this approved by the FDA, they need funding.

 

It breaks my heart to even consider that children like Marley might die because there is not enough money to even research how her disease is affecting her.

My Marley has fought RCDP her entire life, and I will fight for her in any way I can.

PLEASE HELP ME FIND A MIRACLE FOR MARLEY!

 

All funds raised will be donated directly:

50% to RhizoKids International, A 501c nonprofit  organization started by families of children with RCDP to help fund research. RhizoKids is the primary contributor to the RCDP team of doctors. 

50% to Marley's parents, Crystal and Jonathan Bedford, to help pay for Marley's extensive medical bills.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

This campaign isn't solely about funding. It is about RAISING AWARENESS! Please share Marley's video on facebook, twitter, youtube, or any other site. Let's get everyone to know about RCDP!

Also, visit:

www.rhizokids.com

www.facebook.com/sweetmarleys

SHARE ANY WAY YOU CAN!

story:
Short Summary

Maternal Earth is dedicated to strengthening health access and education to women across their lifespan and the globe. Maternal Earth works with communities in developing countries to create sustainable solutions to gaps in maternal health care. While working in Uganda, Executive Director, Jess Restucci spent time on Kimi Island in Uganda. Here one midwive with the help of a part time nurse, takes care of all the medical needs of the women on the island, and many of the mens. She does this with very limited resources; limited access to clean water, medical supplies, and a lack of a clean and safe place for women to deliver. She currently is working out of her two room hut. 
 

What We Need

Your contribution will go towards the contruction of the actual clinic, including buying the land. The clinic will consist of four rooms: reception, delivery, examination, and recovery. We will also be stocking the clinic with delivery beds, clean sheets, adaquate medical supplies and sanitation supplies along with materials for medical records. 

The Impact

In Rural Uganda only 32% of births are attended by a trained medical professional. The Sesse Islands where Kimi is located, are a group of 84 islands located in Lake Victoria. Services such as ante- and postnatal care and family planning are provided by 11 health centers spread across the islands. Travel to the main land is expensive, and limited, only one boat leaves the island for the mainland a day, making it difficult for women to recieve medical care. Currently there is not a clean place for delivery, or access to clean/sanitized instruments. This greatly increases risk of complications and post natal infections.

Since one boat leaves the island a day, high risk pregnancies often get delivered on route to the mainland, resulting in injury or death 

The Clnic will: 

•Serve the population of Kimi Island and surrounding islands. Kimi Island has 5,000 residents.
 
•Provide prenatal, post natal, and health women care, as well as trainings for the community
 
•Provide a safe and clean place for delivery

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help, please spread the word about our campaign!

Don't forget to tell your Twitter and facebook friends.

story:
Wahya Warriors is currently working through USDA Rural Development to place a not for profit Veterans Specialized Assisted Living and Memory Care campuses throughout Texas. The purpose of the campus is to aid the aging and disabled veteran to retain independence at the highest level possible. Currently in America we are facing a crisis with the Baby Boomers approaching. With only a very few licensed facilities that will accept VA, Tricare, medicaid and medicare benefits. The goal for the community is to aid and assist veterans with the highest care available. Instead of relying on home based visits and being placed on a waiting list for one of the few beds to open up. Not only will it serve veterans and their family, the veterans can continue to serve the community by interacting with other veterans who are members of VFW, American Legion, etc. Once the facility is operational, the facility will be turned over to a board of Veterans to run and manage. Veterans taking care of veterans.

Assisted Living:

Veterans are increasingly using their benefits to pay for assisted living, but the number of beneficiaries could be higher, experts say. There are nearly 13 million wartime veterans in the United States who could qualify for nearly $2,000 monthly toward assisted living …
According to VA estimates, 2.3 million veterans who served in World War II are living in the United States, in addition to 2.6 million who served in Korea and 7.7 million in Vietnam. To qualify, members must have served a minimum of only 90 days and must meet other medical and financial qualifications. As reported in The Wall Street Journal, about 105,000 veterans as well as a large number of widows were using their benefits as of last year. "This can be really important not only for older Americans, but also for their children if they're trying to deal with parents and how they're going to pay" for assisted living and other long-term-care services, says Tom Pamperin, an associate deputy undersecretary in the VA's Veterans Benefits Administration.
The benefit is underused, he says, because "it doesn't occur to veterans in their 70s who may have had no encounter with the VA other than qualifying for a home loan 40 years ago that there are benefits payable to them."


Memory Care:

Study results reported this month in the Journal of the American Geriatrics Society suggest that Veterans with post traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) have a higher risk for dementia than their peers without PTSD. The authors emphasize that while PTSD was associated with higher risk, the greater majority of Veterans with PTSD in the study did not develop dementia. Older veterans with post-traumatic stress disorder were almost twice as likely to develop dementia as veterans without PTSD in a study of more than 180,000 veterans led by researchers at the San Francisco VA Medical Center and the University of California, San Francisco. The veterans were then followed from 2001 to 2007 and assessed for development of dementia according to standard medical diagnosis codes. By 2007, veterans with PTSD had a dementia rate of 10.6 percent, while veterans without PTSD had a dementia rate of 6.6 percent.

Fundraising Pre Development Costs:

The communities Board will need to fundraise with local TV and newspapers, VFW, American Legion as well as other sources. The amount we are looking to fundraise will be approximately $100,000. That is to pay for Developers expenses, USDA application fee’s,  architect, builder, financier, land option money, and feasibility studies.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Ryan White, founder of Tribe-X and Project Break Free America. I am a Certified Personal Trainer, Clinical Exercise Specialist and Advanced Health and Fitness Specialist through the American Council on Exercise, as well as a MovNat Certified Trainer with advanced study in Raw and Superfood Nutrition, Lifestyle and Weight Management, Metabolic Conditioning, Pre and Post Natal Fitness and Postural Assessment. I have helped hundreds of people lose thousands of pounds, completely get off diabetes, high blood pressure and cholesterol medications while rediscovering a quality of life they thought they would never see. 

Project Break Free is the next step in my mission to get America moving again, to reversing this obesity epidemic that is plaguing our nation, straining our financial system and killing our future. 2/3 of our population are overweight or obese and it costs our society $17 for every pound we are overweight. Obesity has been cited as a contributing factor to approximately 100,000-400,000 deaths in the United States ever year and was responsible for an estimated $147 billion in related healthcare costs in 2008 alone. Obesity-related medical problems are on the rise, diabetes is now the seventh leading cause of death in America and 1 out of 3 children born after the year 2000 will develop diabetes and are predicted to be the first generation to die before their parents.

We cannot continue down this path, and with your help we can make a statement. 

What We Need & What You Get

We have set an initial goal of raising $36,000 to help save 6 severely obese individuals. To do this we will remove these individuals from the current environment that reinforces all their negative behaviors and we will provide them with a safe, supportive, structured environment where we can use our multi-disciplinary approach to create the ultimate health and fitness transformations.

We focus on three critical areas: behavior and lifestyle modification, clean, organic nutrition, and physical activity built on a foundation of movement quality. This one year program includes an initial 6 week stay at our in-home training center outside Denver, Colorado where each guest will be given a custom nutrition management program designed by registered dieticians, provided with clean, organic food free of pesticides and GMOs, as well as a cutting edge physical training program, and daily coaching sessions that involve goal setting, activity and nutritional education and mental performance training to dissolve any emotional and mental barriers that may arise.

Each amazing transformation will be filmed as part of an inspiring documentary to help us spread our message, support our cause and inspire others to take action. The money we raise will give us the ability to provide transportation, food, nutritional supplements, housing, expert training, coaching, and ongoing support for the 6 individuals that most desperately need our help.

We have lined up some amazing perks for all of you that join our movement and support our cause and will be adding more perks as our campaign progresses. 

The Impact

We will be accepting applications, letters, and videos between now and March 1st to breakfree@tribe-x.com and we will be reviewing those submissions to find the 6 people who most desperately want and need to transform their lives. Even though we can only choose 6 individuals initially to receive this lifesaving transformation, every single person that contacts us will have free access to our cutting edge, online video training program that will give them the knowledge, structure, motivation and accountability necessary to start their own health and fitness transformation. By dropping this stone into the pond we will create ripples that can have a profound impact on our economy, our future and the health of our Nation. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute monetarily, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

You can get the word out to your circle of influence and make some noise about our campaign. You can use the Indiegogo share tools to help us create awareness and reach as many people as possible. If you know someone in the media, please ask if they will give us a shout out. Any support you can give is welcomed and extremely appreciated. 

If you know someone that needs our help please have them contact us at breakfree@tribe-x.com.  Thank-you again for your support and until next time go enliven your body, awaken your mind and empower your soul today!
story_txt:
Short Summary
My name is Ryan White, founder of Tribe-X and Project Break Free America. I am a Certified Personal Trainer, Clinical Exercise Specialist and Advanced Health and Fitness Specialist through the American Council on Exercise, as well as a MovNat Certified Trainer with advanced study in Raw and Superfood Nutrition, Lifestyle and Weight Management, Metabolic Conditioning, Pre and Post Natal Fitness and Postural Assessment. I have helped hundreds of people lose thousands of pounds, completely get off diabetes, high blood pressure and cholesterol medications while rediscovering a quality of life they thought they would never see. 
Project Break Free is the next step in my mission to get America moving again, to reversing this obesity epidemic that is plaguing our nation, straining our financial system and killing our future. 2/3 of our population are overweight or obese and it costs our society $17 for every pound we are overweight. Obesity has been cited as a contributing factor to approximately 100,000-400,000 deaths in the United States ever year and was responsible for an estimated $147 billion in related healthcare costs in 2008 alone. Obesity-related medical problems are on the rise, diabetes is now the seventh leading cause of death in America and 1 out of 3 children born after the year 2000 will develop diabetes and are predicted to be the first generation to die before their parents. 
We cannot continue down this path, and with your help we can make a statement. 


What We Need & What You Get
We have set an initial goal of raising $36,000 to help save 6 severely obese individuals. To do this we will remove these individuals from the current environment that reinforces all their negative behaviors and we will provide them with a safe, supportive, structured environment where we can use our multi-disciplinary approach to create the ultimate health and fitness transformations.

story:
Hello,

 

We are setting up this fund to help our mother.  June had a massive heart attack on October 10, 2012.  She has been in the hospital and is preparing for open heart surgery and valve repair/replacement.  At this time she is on dialysis to clear the fluid and allow her heart to become stronger as she prepares for surgery.  June’s husband has been by her side while in the hospital, he has not left. 

 

She has no income or insurance.  At this time, funds are truly needed to helps assist her through this. 

 

She started her ministry preaching in the streets and many have been saved from addictions.  She then was called as a missionary.  She has been to India and opened an orphanage, helped save widows as she gave them a home and touched the lives of many.  After that, she went to Africa and ministered to many others while being hidden to preach the Gospel of Jesus Christ.  She then returned to the United States and continued to let the Lord lead her in ministry as many more people have been healed.

 

We all truly appreciate any and all donations.  They will be used to support her through this in as many ways possible.  Please keep her in your prayers as we pray for her healing and God to re send her into ministry again.

 

Thank you,

 

Amy, Stephanie and Meghon

story:
Nalini's work as a mentor to undergraduate, graduate, post-doctoral fellows and junior faculty is among her most significant contributions to psychological science. She exemplified rigor, and did so with caring warmth. We are collecting donations with the hope of establishing the Nalini Ambady Mentorship Award. We hope to give this award annually to a psychological science mentor who embodies her example of generous excellence.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate money, please consider registering on BeTheMatch.org.

story:
Who is Valarie and why should you care?

Valerie DeFrance's work as an EMS professional includes her position as a founding member of the Hope-Sunrise EMS service--an all-volunteer, nonprofit group, which according to Valerie has never had more than a dozen responders to cover a community of 250 residents and 20 miles of a busy major highway. She entered EMS in 1984 after her brother died in a car crash two miles from home and the closest emergency care was 60 minutes away.

"In those days a trooper was usually first sent to an accident to see if an ambulance was needed, so there were a lot of delays," she says. "I decided that was nonsense; we needed somebody local to respond."

Fortunately, that was a time when the region was looking to expand EMS, and Valerie stepped up--first as a student, then as an instructor. She progressed through the levels of EMT certification to paramedic course coordinator and served as president of the Kenai Peninsula EMS Council for seven years, in addition to being a member of numerous state and local committees and boards.

In 2007, after a 30 year career of helping people and teaching others how to be good EMT's and paramedics, Valerie was recognized as the best of the best and awarded the 22nd Annual Braun Industries/ZOLL Medical EMT/Paramedic of the Year.

Since 1999, Valerie has operated a website called the EMS House of DeFrance (www.defrance.org), and has operated the Emergency Medical Services Educational Resources website since 2000 (http://defrance.org/inst), which is a free online repository of instructional materials and multimedia presentations. She is also publisher of EMSNetwork News (www.emsnetwork.org), a free online site; webmistress for www.emsspeakers.org and for the new National EMS Museum Foundation. She is a prolific writer and operates numerous other specialty EMS websites.

In addition to the websites, Valerie created a Pediatric Seat Belt Safety Program and a comic book series for children that teaches injury prevention and how to call 9-1-1. She helped develop software to help EMS services track, extrapolate and archive patient databases and statistics. She has twice been recipient of Alaska's "First Lady Award for Volunteerism," from the governor's wife.

Recently, when a local EMS training program declared bankruptcy, Valerie volunteered her time and personal funds for six months to enable the 11 paramedic students to complete their training. This came at a time when her husband (who later died) was ill and funds were scarce.

All of these accomplishments barely scratch the surface of Valerie's contribution to EMS, but you wouldn't hear it from her. This unassuming lady still thinks she's just "a small cog in the EMS wheel," as one of her supporters put it. What drives her to continue? "Knowing you can make a difference in the quality of people's lives," she says. "Anything you can do to send them home from the hospital in as close to the shape they were in before an illness or injury occurred is the name of the game for me."

What We Need

Valerie's husband died of cancer only a few years back. Even with insurance the bills were almost insurmountable; forcing Valerie to sell off most of her assets and her home. 

And now Valerie has cancer and there is nothing left to sell. 

Valerie has given so much to her home community and to the pre-hospital medical professions, and has done so selflessly. Valerie has been a giver, never a taker, and now we need to return the favor. 

All funds collected here will go to fund ongoing cancer treatment. The cancer was caught at a stage where the hopes for survival are good. A tumor was surgically removed and now she is in radiation therapy. We can make a difference.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate cash then please donate a little time. Spread the word. Link to this campaign. Ask others to do the same. Use the Indiegogo share tools. Lets get the word out and help Vallerie beat cancer!

story:
Our Story

Camp Living Water’s Mission is about so much more than providing a fun-filled week for kids. We truly believe that amongst our current campers are the very children who will be changing the world for the better starting at an early age. Our staff is highly trained to discover each child’s special gifts and is committed to developing the full potential within EVERY child. All outstanding leaders and extraordinary disciples of Christ came from somewhere and we are convinced that some of the next great leaders will have once walked the soil at Camp Living Water.

 

We provide campers with an incredible staff, great cooking, lots of recreation, inspirational speakers, rustic yet comfortable facilities, awesome music, and fun team building games that enhance self-esteem and confidence. 


We are strongly committed to making every child’s week with us a memorable and positive life changing experience. Another goal of Camp Living Water is to forge the way in uniting (or reuniting) youth from all parts of Wyoming and its surrounding states for the purpose of Christian fellowship. At Camp Living Water we believe there is no higher calling than to be entrusted with helping shape a child’s faith. Please join us this summer for an unforgettable week!
  
The Impact

Many families in our valley like so many other communities have been hit hard by the recession and can’t afford even half of the tuition needed for camp. Completing a successful campaign will ensure that more children will be able to pack their duffel bags and head immediately to camp. Others whose camps have already occurred will be assured of a spot for next year. Research has shown that a week of summer camp has a greater long term impact on a child’s faith development and social and emotional growth than an entire academic school year. Many Christians can trace the roots of their relationships with Christ back to a campfire long ago amongst loving and committed camp staff. A lost opportunity for even one child is a loss we can’t afford.

 

What We Need & What You Get
We need to raise $40,000 before summer's end for scholarships for campers in need of support as well as ongoing operating costs of camp such as food, supplies, and counselor salaries.

Cost of camp for one camper:

½ a day of camp = $50

4 days of camp = $400

1 day of camp = $100

4.5 days of camp = $450

1.5 days of camp = $150

5 days of camp = $500

2 days of camp = $200

5.5 days of camp = $550

2.5 days of camp = $250

6 days of camp = $600

3 days of camp = $300

6.5 days of camp = $650

3.5 days of camp = $350

7 days of camp = $700

 
Other Ways You Can Help
Encourage your family and friends to participate in our campaign to raise $40k in 40 days and 40 nights, by sharing this link with them. We truly appreciate your prayers this summer! Finally, it is not too late to sign up for camp, anyone entering 5th, 6th, 7th, or 8th grade is welcome!

story:
About This Project

Make your smartphones smarter!

Mobixpay (mo - bex - pay) is more than a mobile shopping App.  It's a movement!  And the goal of this Indiegogo campaign is to fund a redesign of the App that adds functionality so you can have that many more ways to sell, shop and save when using your smartphone.

The Indiegogo funding will be used to complete product enhancements that will make the mobiXpay platform more functional and easier to use while providing you with fast access to what we hope will become the largest collection of location-based deals available via smartphone today.

Specifically, the biggest changes to mobiXpay will include:

  • Helping every mobiXpay user become a potential seller of goods, services and experiences solely through the use of their smartphone.  (A faster, 100% mobile and location-based alternative to websites like eBay and Craigslist).
  • Providing quick searchable access to 1000s of local daily deals.  (No need to search for or flip through the scores of daily deal websites and email).
  • Delivering a faster and easier registration and publishing website for local merchants.  (It will be even easier for your favorite stores to reward you for your loyalty with customized and timely deals).

These enhancements will go a long way towards establishing mobiXpay as the global go-to mobile shopping App that transforms the way we all sell, shop and save.

Remember, the more funding we receive the faster we can develop and deliver our product enhancements.  And, honestly, we're hoping to kick the crap out of our target.  So, please, do fund us today.

Why mobiXpay?

It's simple.  We want to drive sales to our local businesses while saving money when we shop.  We also know that our neighbors have great things to sell and we want to find them too - through use of the same App!

A win-win.

To achieve this we need you to join the movement to make mobiXpay the go-to mobile shopping App.

Please download and use the current App and let us know how to make it better.  Your feedback will help us during our redesign.  Our goals are to deliver an App that exceeds your expectations while helping you save money every time you shop.

How does mobiXpay work today?

Businesses register at www.mobixpay.com where they create and publish offers for FREE.  Any legitimate business can register: world-wide.

There is no middle man.  No one to take a piece of the action.  They decide what they want to offer, when the offer is valid and with what restrictions.

They publish loyalty offers like "15% off anytime" to reward you for your continued patronage.  They are grateful for your repeat business and want to reward you.  Let them!

They also publish special offers like "buy 1 get 1 free".

If they need to move extra inventory, fill seats or sell perishable items, mobiXpay provides the perfect platform for them to publish these offers instantly: letting you in on the savings.

Loyalty pays and everyone saves!

Join the movement! Get your favorite businesses to register and publish offers on mobiXpay today.  It's free for them and it gives you that many more places and ways to save.

You download the mobiXpay App for your: iPhone or Android smartphone.  It's FREE.

You search for items you want.

Save your local offers with one tap.

Redeem each offer by showing merchants the saved coupon on your smartphone.

No printing, no clipping, no punch cards, no ripping out paper ads.

Search, save and present from the convenience of your smartphone.

It's that simple. It's that easy. It works.

What future changes to mobiXpay will the Indiegogo funding support?

Key prototype pieces of the mobiXpay platform are available:

  • Website for merchants to create offers
  • iPhone and Android mobile Apps for customers to access and present offers

Now we want to improve both the user experience and functionality of the mobiXpay platform.

The biggest change will be to include functionality that turns every user into a potential location-based seller of goods, services and experiences.

We leverage the camera function on your smartphone and marry it to our forms and location-based back-end.  You take or upload a saved picture or image of your item, create a title and brief description and make additional selections and in mere minutes you have created and published your listing.

MobiXpay users enter search criteria and a shopping radius (e.g., 1-25 miles) to find local sellers:  from their smartphone!

No need for you to go to a website to create a listing for things you want to sell.  Soon, with mobiXpay, you will be able to sell your product, service or experience locally and entirely through your smartphone.

Currently, the planned pricing for a 20-day listing is as follows ($USD):

$2.99 (for items priced to $250)

$4.99 (for items priced $251-500)

$9.99 (for items priced $501 and above). 

This would become your only cost to list items on mobiXpay.

Use your perks gained from your Indiegogo pledge to be among the FIRST  to offer items for sale in your community with the redesign of the mobiXpay App this fall 2012.  And, what's even better, is that your listings will be valid for 30 days or until cancelled.  (As long as your rewards are used by December 31, 2013).

Other planned enhancements include:

  • Improving the user experience (look, feel, navigation) based on your feedback and the added functionality
  • Creating a daily deals feature to provide quick access to offers published by the biggest group couponing sites. (Access all of the local deals with one tap and have them presented on one screen)
  • Revamping the current website to make it even easier for merchants to create and publish deals.

What changes will be made if the Indiegogo goal is exceeded?

Depending on the amount raised the following additional enhancements are planned for this fall:

  • Launching a mobile web version for consumers not using iPhone or Android smartphones
  • Enhancing the notification feature so you can choose to be alerted when your favorite merchant(s) adds or updates an offer
  • Integrating a one-tap payment feature so items can be easily purchased within the App
  • Adding a new notification feature so you receive an alert when a local seller posts an item that appears on your "wish list".

You can help revolutionize the way we sell, shop and save!

We have accomplished a lot with the App and business model but need the Indiegogo funding to complete our development work.  Each participation level and perk gets us closer to meeting our goals.  Please select a reward level and make your contribution today.

Other Ways You Can Help

Join the movement.  Become a mob(X)star!  Use the Indiegogo share tools to help us spread the word.  (They are located under the video above).  And, when you share, please ask your friends and followers to share our campaign too.  If enough of you do this then Indiegogo will reward us and feature us on their homepage for the whole world to see. And, that is an awesome way to launch a movement!

Please download the mobiXpay App on your iPhone or Android smartphone.  It's FREE.  And, remember to leave us great feedback.  It will make it easier for others to find "mobixpay" in the app store.

Finally, please get your favorite merchants to register on mobiXpay and begin presenting offers.  It's FREE for them and it provides you with that many more places and ways to save.  (If you are a merchant: what are you waiting for? It's FREE!)

You have our sincere thanks!

Final thoughts....

Imagine a world where you turn on your phone and enter a search word for something you want to buy.   (You can be at home, at work, or simply walking along a busy street).

In seconds you know who is selling your item, service or experience; where it is being sold; and, with what money-saving offers.  Helping you to save every time you shop.

This is achievable. Today.

Together we can make this happen - every day for everyone.

Join us and contribute to our campaign and help us revolutionize the way we sell, shop and save. Today!

PS - Mobixpay was launched last October 2011 in Upper Manhattan (Upper West Side, Morningside Heights - Columbia University and Harlem, NYC) with more than 50 local merchants adopting the platform.  Here is the mobiXpay demo featuring these participating merchants.  The demo was made to introduce the App to local users relatively new to smartphones and to the use of mobile Apps.

MobiXpay Demo

Remember, the more funding we receive the faster we can develop and deliver our product enhancements.  And, honestly, we're hoping to kick the crap out of our target.  So, please, do fund us today.
Why mobiXpay?
It's simple.  We want to drive sales to our local businesses while saving money when we shop.  We also know that our neighbors have great things to sell and we want to find them too - through use of the same App!
A win-win.
To achieve this we need you to join the movement to make mobiXpay the go-to mobile shopping App.
Please download and use the current App and let us know how to make it better.  Your feedback will help us during our redesign.  Our goals are to deliver an App that exceeds your expectations while helping you save money every time you shop.
How does mobiXpay work today?
Businesses register at www.mobixpay.com where they create and publish offers for FREE.  Any legitimate business can register: world-wide.
There is no middle man.  No one to take a piece of the action.  They decide what they want to offer, when the offer is valid and with what restrictions.
They publish loyalty offers like "15% off anytime" to reward you for your continued patronage.  They are grateful for your repeat business and want to reward you.  Let them!
They also publish special offers like "buy 1 get 1 free".
If they need to move extra inventory, fill seats or sell perishable items, mobiXpay provides the perfect platform for them to publish these offers instantly: letting you in on the savings.
Loyalty pays and everyone saves!
Join the movement! Get your favorite businesses to register and publish offers on mobiXpay today.  It's free for them and it gives you that many more places and ways to save.
You download the mobiXpay App for your: iPhone or Android smartphone.  It's FREE.
You search for items you want.
Save your local offers with one tap.
Redeem each offer by showing merchants the saved coupon on your smartphone.
No printing, no clipping, no punch cards, no ripping out paper ads.
Search, save and present from the convenience of your smartphone.
It's that simple. It's that easy. It works.
What future changes to mobiXpay will the Indiegogo funding support?
Key prototype pieces of the mobiXpay platform are available:

Website for merchants to create offers
iPhone and Android mobile Apps for customers to access and present offers
Now we want to improve both the user experience and functionality of the mobiXpay platform.
The biggest change will be to include functionality that turns every user into a potential location-based seller of goods, services and experiences.
We leverage the camera function on your smartphone and marry it to our forms and location-based back-end.  You take or upload a saved picture or image of your item, create a title and brief description and make additional selections and in mere minutes you have created and published your listing.
MobiXpay users enter search criteria and a shopping radius (e.g., 1-25 miles) to find local sellers:  from their smartphone!
No need for you to go to a website to create a listing for things you want to sell.  Soon, with mobiXpay, you will be able to sell your product, service or experience locally and entirely through your smartphone.
Currently, the planned pricing for a 20-day listing is as follows ($USD):
$2.99 (for items priced to $250)
$4.99 (for items priced $251-500)
$9.99 (for items priced $501 and above). 
This would become your only cost to list items on mobiXpay.
Use your perks gained from your Indiegogo pledge to be among the FIRST  to offer items for sale in your community with the redesign of the mobiXpay App this fall 2012.  And, what's even better, is that your listings will be valid for 30 days or until cancelled.  (As long as your rewards are used by December 31, 2013).
Other planned enhancements include:

Improving the user experience (look, feel, navigation) based on your feedback and the added functionality
Creating a daily deals feature to provide quick access to offers published by the biggest group couponing sites. (Access all of the local deals with one tap and have them presented on one screen)
Revamping the current website to make it even easier for merchants to create and publish deals.
What changes will be made if the Indiegogo goal is exceeded?
Depending on the amount raised the following additional enhancements are planned for this fall:

Launching a mobile web version for consumers not using iPhone or Android smartphones
Enhancing the notification feature so you can choose to be alerted when your favorite merchant(s) adds or updates an offer
Integrating a one-tap payment feature so items can be easily purchased within the App
Adding a new notification feature so you receive an alert when a local seller posts an item that appears on your "wish list".
You can help revolutionize the way we sell, shop and save!
We have accomplished a lot with the App and business model but need the Indiegogo funding to complete our development work.  Each participation level and perk gets us closer to meeting our goals.  Please select a reward level and make your contribution today.
Other Ways You Can Help
Join the movement.  Become a mob(X)star!  Use the Indiegogo share tools to help us spread the word.  (They are located under the video above).  And, when you share, please ask your friends and followers to share our campaign too.  If enough of you do this then Indiegogo will reward us and feature us on their homepage for the whole world to see. And, that is an awesome way to launch a movement!
Please download the mobiXpay App on your iPhone or Android smartphone.  It's FREE.  And, remember to leave us great feedback.  It will make it easier for others to find "mobixpay" in the app store.
Finally, please get your favorite merchants to register on mobiXpay and begin presenting offers.  It's FREE for them and it provides you with that many more places and ways to save.  (If you are a merchant: what are you waiting for? It's FREE!)
You have our sincere thanks!
Final thoughts....
Imagine a world where you turn on your phone and enter a search word for something you want to buy.   (You can be at home, at work, or simply walking along a busy street).
In seconds you know who is selling your item, service or experience; where it is being sold; and, with what money-saving offers.  Helping you to save every time you shop.
This is achievable. Today.
Together we can make this happen - every day for everyone.
Join us and contribute to our campaign and help us revolutionize the way we sell, shop and save. Today!
PS - Mobixpay was launched last October 2011 in Upper Manhattan (Upper West Side, Morningside Heights - Columbia University and Harlem, NYC) with more than 50 local merchants adopting the platform.  Here is the mobiXpay demo featuring these participating merchants.  The demo was made to introduce the App to local users relatively new to smartphones and to the use of mobile Apps.
MobiXpay Demo

story:
(I restarted our previous campaign and made this new page)

Who We Are

Richard (Ricky) my husband was born with Hip Displaysia and Blount's Diease. He had a surgery as a baby for the Hip Displaysia and several more throughout his youth. Ultimately he knew that one day he would need a total hip replacement.

He's now 33 years old and married with 4 beautiful children (10, 5, 4, and 2). He is an awesome father and our kids love him so much. It saddens them each day to see Daddy in so much pain. The time has come for the surgery that he knew he would need. He needs a total hip and femur replacement right away. His hip is collapsed and his femur is severly deformed. 

Ricky was intially denied hip replacement 5 years ago due to obesity which would make it a high risk. A couple years later we were blessed with him being able to get bariactric surgery (gastric bypass) pro bono. He lost 100 pounds over time and was no longer obese. He has gained some weight now due to his limited mobility and its getting harder for him each day. He is in constant severe pain and sleeping at night is difficult. 

I work full time and he stays home with the kids. Lately though I have had to call in to work and stay home to help care for the kids and him. This is putting strain on my job and our finances. 

If he doesn't get the surgery as soon as possible then I will be forced to stop working and he will continue to get worse. Currently he is walking 100% of the time with a cane and he is homebound 90% of the time. 

I can take a leave of absence from work but it would not be a paid leave. We do not have any savings to afford me out of work while he recovers. Our insurance covers the cost of the surgery. His recovery should be around 6-8 weeks.

I have exhausted every resource and tried my best to make this happen on our own and we have run out of time. We can't save due to the lack of finances as it is for our current needs because of me missing work so much to help him and the kids. 

 

Our Need

We need to be able to survive while I am home caring for Ricky post surgery and the kids. The doctor believes that it will be 6-8 weeks(typical hip replacement recovery time) it could vary depending on his deformity and how it heals. 

We need at least $8000 in order to cover our exspenses for 1-3 months. This will cover our rent, utilities, food, diapers and gas money for travel to and from the doctor, hospital and rehab (post surgery). 

 

By helping you will enable Ricky to have a normal pain free life. He will be able to walk without struggle. He will also be able to go back to work and pursue school to continue his education.

If you are unable to contribute we welcome prayer and if you can use the Indiegogo Share tools to help more people see our information we would be so very grateful.

story:
Running is different things to different people. It can be an obsession, an addiction, a hobby, or it can even be a punishment.

For me running is a passion.

I am constantly challenging myself and pushing my limits as a runner. I have ran every race distance from 5K to 50 Miler. My next test is the 2013 Goofy Challenge during the Walt Disney World Marathon Weekend.

The Goofy Challenge is a total of 39.3 miles. It consists of the WDW Half Marathon on Saturday followed by the WDW Marathon on Sunday.

The cost of running can be expensive, but the returns running gives you are priceless. Since the Goofy Challenge is a destination race I am looking for sponsors to help cover the cost of running this event. The main expenses are race entry fee, airfare, accomodations, and food for me and my girlfriend, Jamie, who is also running the Goofy Challenge.

I have been blessed with the ability to run, the good health to push myself, and blessed with friends online and offline that support the running community and inspire and motivate me everyday. If I can continue to be blessed with sponsors I wil be forever grateful and I will pay my blessings forward.

I am donating 20% of all sponsorship money to the Wounded Warrior Project. If I can significantly exceed my initial goal of $2000 I will increase the percentage donated based on the total sponsorship I receive.

Why Should You Sponsor Me?

So why, you may be asking yourself, should I sponsor a mid pack runner on his quest to become a Goofy Challenger?

Here are three reasons in reverse order of importance:

  1. You are helping a fellow endurance athlete continually test his limits and push his body. You are contributing to my improvement physically, mentally, and spiritually.
  2. You receive rewards! The various sponsorship levels offer rewards as a thank you for your contribution. The $39 level sponsorship will get you all of the personal rewards as well as allow you to honor a military man or woman you love.
  3. Sponsorships also benefit the Wounded Warrior Project. There will be at least 20% of all sponsorships going to the organization.

The Race Shirt

I am designing a t-shirt that will be a key factor in this campaign. I will have 3 or 4 of the same shirt to wear during race weekend. It will be seen by tens of thousands of people at the race expo, during the half marathon, during the full marathon, and around various locations on the Disney properties.

On the back of the shirt there will be enough space reserved for the names of up to 100 military personel that I will be honoring on behalf of personal sponsors. The list will include Name, Rank, and Branch of service for each person. 

On the back of the shirt, along the bottom, will be space for the "Ultramarathon" level sponsors, and the front of the t-shirt will be given to the title sponsor level.

Corporate Sponsors

There are two sponsorship levels set up for corporate sponsors. These levels are open to any business, brand, website, company, or person. Please remember this is a runDisney event so any corporate sponsor should be family friendly. Runner friendly is good too, but not a requirement.

The first level is limited to 4 spots. This level will buy you a logo spot on the back of the race shirt. Your logo must be a black and white image with 300 DPI in JPG or PNG format. The image can be any shape or brand look, but must fit within a 3 inch wide by 2 inch border. I will also review your product on my blog.

The title sponsor is limited to 1 spot. Your logo appears on the front of the shirt. Your logo can be up to four colors. It must be a JPG or PNG format with 300 DPI. The image can be any shape or brand look, but must fit within a 14 inch by 14 inch border. Along with that I will also use any samples you wish to provide to me and I will post reviews and promotion on my blog, YouTube and social networking sites. If your product is race appropriate I will use it through the entire marathon weekend in public and provide exposure for your product in real world settings.

Images need to be emailed to me no later than 5 days after this campaign ends. Any questions regarding sponsorships can be posted as a comment on this campaign.

More About Me

I have been running since 2008. First it was a challenge to get off the couch, but with each step the challenges grew tougher. First it was finishing a mile without stopping. Then it was finishing a 5K and then a 10K. Ten miles, half marathon, marathon and ultra marathon. I am always looking at the next level in my running and trying to improve myself and run strong.

I am a widowed father of two sons. Tyler is 9 and Christopher is 5. I am not a perfect father, but I try my best to show my sons they can do so much more than they think they can. And I use running to show them.

I am also a writer. I blog about running at my website, www.billdowis.com and I am currently completing a running memoir to tell my story of running through loss, love and life.

I love encouraging people to run and become active. Everyone can push past the limits they place on themselves and achieve things that seem impossible to them. This motivates me.

story:
Why this is important

  Hi ! I'm Jerry and I grew up in  Santa Barbara, CA and was in or on the water almost every day of my life for over 20 years, fishing, sailing, snorkeling and SCUBA diving.  I went to school for Marine Technology to learn about building submarines, Marine Architecture and underwater welding...I thought I wanted to work for the Oil Companies..

.One day I got the idea for a way for people to be able to breath for long periods of time underwater without tanks or compressors or fancy (expensive) equipment and thought this would be a blessing to so many people around the world who dive for seafood to feed their families or their villages...and how many of them drown while trying to hold their breath and something happens..

 Oyster divers in Japan and China....Urchin divers in Malta and New Guinea...all kinds of divers from all over the world trying to make a better living...This simple and inexpensive piece of equipment could change their world and save a lot of lives. Once word gets out and it catches on everybody making a living on, in, or near the water will want to have one (or should anyway).

What We Need & What you get

   What is needed now to move forward with this is to get Patented and Licensed.  I have my drawings and notes for the Patent Process but need machine drawings and Prototype built . The molds are the most expensive part of this and I need five of them. After the Patent is filed I would love to show you the finished product and demonstrate exactly how it works.  Sorry to be so mysterious about this right now, but it won't take me long to do the next steps.  I have three big Companies in mind I would like to offer a License to.  They will handle all the manufacturing, distribution and sales since they do such a great job of it already. 

 I will keep you updated on all the social media as well as here and I'm setting up a personal webpage right now to keep everybody posted. If this goes well,  I'll set it up as  a business - I have other gizmos...

 Unique perks..

.Pictures and stories from people all over the world saying how this product has affected their life or their village.

 Product purchase at cost/wholesale.

 Opportunity to buy stock at $1 / share

 Give me ideas...

 IF I don't reach my goal I will use the money to at least get through the Patent process to the point where someone would be willing to finish it so it at least gets out to the world.

The Impact

   WILL be immeasurable. Numerous lives will be saved.  People will do better economically and not have to worry if they will live through another day trying to provide for their family or community.

Other Ways You Can Help

 If you can't help with money, but you see the impact this could have on the world you can always help by getting the word out...link this project to all your friends...TELL THE WORLD !

 And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools !

story:
Hello friends, family and whom ever else may read my story. My name is Michael LaViolette and I was diagnosed with (ALL) acute lymphocytic leukemia on March 14th 2013. As you can imagine the news blind sided my wife and I like there's no tomorrow literally stopping not only our lives but the entire family. I've been in the hospital receiving chemotherapy ever since except maybe 1 week per month when I get to go home. I am currently finishing my last round and waiting for my bone marrow transplant in Tampa which is 4 hours away from home. The amount of money I will need to have a successful transplant is more than I can afford between travel expenses back and forth, medicines, co-pays, unable to work and still pay$450 a month so I can even have insurance to get my much needed treatments. My cancer is very aggressive and I have no time to spare. On top of all that I have to make sure my vehicle will make it back and forth to Tampa. I have to make sure the repairs to my father's home where my wife and I live now are completed before I come home from transplant. Many repairs and renovations are needed to the bathroom, kitchen and our bedroom so I have a clean/sterile environment to live with my new immune system. Any help would be deeply appreciated. Thus whole process is overwhelming and a little bit goes a long way.. Thank You from the bottom of our hearts 

The LaViolette & Burgess family!
